description: **till 15.12 - noise possible, rennovation taking place next door, weekdays daytime only, outside sitting unavailable**Welcome! :) High-End, marvelous 25sqm 1BR located in the heart of Neve Tzedek!You'll be amazed with the location. Designed by an architect and interior designer, steps from the beach (6min. walk), HaCarmel Market(10min. walk) and famous Rothschild Boulevard(3min. walk) ✔A/C✔Smart 50" TV✔WiFi access✔High End kitchen*Additional VAT of 17% for Israelis /תוספת מע''מ לא כלולהThe spaceThe best location you can think of, Come and stay in the best part of Tel Aviv! Located in the best area of Neve Tzedek Neighbourhood- Shabazi/Pines intersection.The place has everything a couple/solo/3 guests traveller needs for the perfect stay:✔Clean bed sheets✔Towels✔Shampoo.On the outside, you'll have the perfect yard of the building surrounded with beautiful plants, and overlooking the famous Anita Ice cream.The place is cozy and functional with a ✔Comfortable Queen bed  ✔Equipped High End Kitchen✔Smart TV with Netflix ✔Private Shower and Toiletthe nearby neighbours are very friendly, and the whole area feels like a small community. The best Ice cream in Israel- ANITA is located just a step from the apartment-Highly recommended!*If this listing is unavailable for your dates, make sure you check my profile to see my other listings, located in Neve Tzedek, meters from this one.Guest accessYou will have the entire place for yourself!Other things to noteEnjoy the place! For every question I'm available***תוספת מע''מ בגובה 17% תגבה מאורחים ישראלים *** Additional VAT of 17% for Israeli citizens***
additional_house_rules:
The building is owned by a family, we ask you to respect the shared yard and keep quiet after 22:00.

*** Please note, for Israeli guests there is a 17% additional VAT charge.

***לאורחים ישראלים תוספת מע''מ 17%.

**Smoking penalty-250$. Smoking inside the apartment is prohibited, there is a smoking area outside.

**קנס עישון בדירה: 250$, העישון מותר בחצר הדירה בלבד!
interaction: I live close by, and will be available at your service to resolve any issue. I am a born and bred Tel Avivian, so feel free to ask me for all recommendations, I'd love to help! always available via phone, or mail. I can also help with transportation from the airport to the apartment at a cheap rate- feel free to ask me about it!
transit: The apartment is very central and close to public transportation, best way to get around Tel Aviv using public transportation is via Moovit app, which makes getting around the city a breeze. you'll also find bike rental stations nearby, and scooters-per-minute are within every few steps of the apartment(apps: Bird, Lime, Wind).

reviews.comments: Wonderful location and value. Would recommend.
Great apartment, location, and host. Central area and easy to get around. Apartment was clean, updated, and comfortable.

What an amazing stay! Absolutely perfect location with everything around by your door step.
Feels homey, clean and better then the pictures.
Highly recommend!

Tomer's place is cute, clean and cozy, and in a fantastic location. Communication and check-in was seamless and Tomer checked in a couple of times to make sure everything was OK, which was great. One small note is that the place looks a bit bigger in the pictures than it really is. If you plan to spend a lot of time in the apartment that might be an issue. But since there is so much to do outside that wouldn't be recommended anyway. :)

Tomer was super cute,
always in touch, answering all our questions.
the apartment is 100% as in the description and you will definitely fall in love with this area. I will gladly recommend this stay!

Tomer's apartment was an amazing choice for me. In walking distance of all the best places to be in Tel Aviv - also well appointed stylish design and comfortable setup to chill out with a wine before heading out in any direction. The roads in the area are small and there is not a lot of traffic,so it was quite peaceful. You mostly hear people chatting quietly across the road at the ice cream shop which adds to the Cafe lifestyle ambiance of the place! Good memories for me all round. Recommended!

This is an amazing place. The location cannot be more central in the heart of Neve Tzedek and surprisingly it was very quite. The unit is beautiful, comfortable and spotless, it was also nice to be able to use the lovely yard. A five star stay in a reasonable price, highly recommended.

I stayed here for a month. The location is everything and Tomer’s hospitality is unmatched. The noise level is very low and the traffic is calm. The house is cozy and has everything you need for both a short and long stay. I recommend this listing 10’s over & over!
Perfectly located with amazing value for money.
Very nice place in pleasant part of Tel Aviv. Tomer was very responsive, check in was easy and place was as advertised.

We loved our stay at Tomer’a place! The location was amazing, such a beautiful part of Tel Aviv. The apartment was very clean! We were a surprised at the size. I looks a lot bigger in the pictures. But it’s enough for a couple, if your planning to be out most of the day exploring!
Great location
Amazing host! A great apartment in a wonderful location! We will definitely come again

חמישה כוכבים.
מיקום מצויין, נקי ומסודר.
תומר עוזר ומגיב ביעילות יוצאת דופן לכל בקשה, ומאפשר לאורח שהייה מהנה ביותר.

דירה נקיה וממוקמת במקום מהמם, חמימה וכיף לשהות בה
מומלץ :)

דירה נעימה ויפה לזוג או יחיד ומה שהכי הרשים אותי היה מידת הניקיון שלה (אחת הדירות הכי נקיות שראיתי במסגרת זו!)
תומר מארח אדיב, מנומס וזמין לכל שאלה. מיקום מעולה הקרוב לים, בתי קפה ומסעדות. שכונה קסומה לטייל בה. אשמח להתארח שם בשנית.

דירה מתוקה ומעוצבת במיקום מושלם
תומר אדיב ונגישנשמח להתארח שוב
תודה רבה
מארח מקסים לדירה קטנטונת, נקיה, וממוקמת מדהים.

דירה מאוד טובה נקיה ושקטה. ים קרוב ( 7 דקות הליכה)
מסעדות ובתי קפה הכי טובים
הייתה חופשה נעימה נחזור למקום הזה שוב

Очень хорошая квартира, чистая уютная и тихая. Всё находится рядом много кафе и ресторанов. До моря 7 минут ходьбы . Советую квартиру Томера, мы обязательно вернёмся ещё раз.

Very comfortable apartments, clear and quiet. Great location, to the sea 7 min to walk, around many cafe and good restaurants. I love it and we will back again to Tomer's apartment. :)
הדירה מהממת, במיקום מעולה ונעים, היה נקי והשירות היה מעולה! תומר היה זמים לכל שאלה והסבר , ממליצה בחום! עוד נחזור :)

דירה נקייה,מעוצבת יפה, במיקום ממש טוב ויחס מעולה :)
בהחלט נחזור שוב
דירה מתוקה, מיקום מעולה! מארח מקסים

הדירה במיקום מרכזי, בלב שכונת נווה צדק, הדירה מרוהטת, מאובזרת ונקיה
תומר היה זמין לכל פניה!
ללא ספק אחזור :)
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper

Private entrance - Separate street or building entrance

description: Sunny 2BR apartment which located on Hakovshim Street. This is a cozy budget apartment with private 2  balconies, 50 sqm in size perfect for friends or  families – great value for money. Its fully equipped, full kitchenette, wifi, cables, renovated shower and toilet.Located only a block from Geula beach and a world away from real life.  Neve-Tzedek and Ben-Yehuda Street are just at your doorstep. 24/7 groceries and pharmacies are just outside. Public transportation is available easily as well.

reviews.comments: Li was a fantastic host for our last minute stay.
Location is great. Interior is nice and comfortable for 3-5 guests. A/C was semi-functional in one of the rooms when we stayed during the hot summer. Overall, pretty good stay.
Great location right on the beach. Photos not an accurate reflection. Several small issues.

The customer service provided by Li was awful. The fact that Airbnb has branded him a “Super host” is embarrassing. Don’t be fooled. The apartment I booked was completely misrepresented and below reasonable expected standards. The subpar apartment is besides the point. I immediately voiced my concerns to Li, just a couple hours after check in and that’s when he went silent. It was only until the next morning after I reached out to Airbnb  customer service that I am self checking out because I couldn’t bare to stay any longer, is when he decided to reply. The purpose of this review is to give other travelers a heads up on what they can expect from Li and not details of the apartment itself. I will therefore end this review by warning other travelers to beware.
Great location, great apartment
Li was a great host and his place was very clean and perfect for our needs. Definitely a recommend!

Do not recommend this place.  It is full of mold and electrical plugs sticking out of kitchen.  Noisy buses that rattle the house. Host took a very long time to respond to check in requests.  Not as pictured in the photos. Very disappointing experience. Way overpriced.

The air bnb was perfect for our short stay. The flat was clean, accurate to pictures, and very comfortable to live in. Li was so helpful and quick to respond to any assistance. The two balconies were amazing and so lovely to sit on for meals.

The only tiny issue was the noise outside of the apartment and also the light that came through the curtains! other than that, wear an eye-mask! I would recommend Li's place :)
Great price and location
Very pleasant time spent in Tel Aviv at Li’s. Thank you again
Perfect
Great host

Li was very easy to communicate with and the place was great. It’s in a fantastic location close to the shuk and the beach, but it’s a little smaller than we expected. Nonetheless, you wouldn’t want to spend the time at home anyway

Very amazing "feel like a local" place to stay extra close to beach, Carmel Market and  Allenby street. Private spacious parking just across the road, bus stops a few steps away, playground for kids just across the road. Great for families or groups of singles. Very clean, tourist info folders, hairdryer, grill, microwave... all a well equipped kitchen needs. Very clean bedding, towels, all we needed. Loved the fact of east facing windows for extra morning light.  And cool afternoons. (And thick, dark curtains for long undisturbed sleep.) Having been there late February with friends and adult kids, the separate bedrooms and the shared living room were just perfect for us. Very cool style. Having been to Israel many times, here we felt instantly at home and like locals. Any time again.

Li is an amazing host! Many thanks for the quick responses. He was ready to answer and help us any time we needed it. We arrived earlier and got a chance to meet Li in person. He was very kind and offered us an upgrade (it was just on the next street from our originally booked apartment). The apartment was not ready for our arrival so we just left our stuff and went to explore the city. When we came back, everything was cleaned and ready for our stay. The location of the house is absolutely perfect - just a minute walk to the beach, so I took my morning tea cup and enjoyed it by the sea. So we just LOVED our stay at Lis place. Highly recommend this place and Li as a host!
Really nice place to stay, would definitely book again

The place is decorated in basic "student", but is glorious filled with light. Location is top and the host wants all to go well, so is very present in communication. The parking was an added plus. Overall, I won't hesitate to go back.

Li is a fantastic host with amazing apartment. That house has everything what you can need, big beds, two balconies, three air-conditionings(!) - one in every room, well equipped kitchen and bathroom. Moreover, what was really important for us - free parking place in private parking opposite apartment. In addition, there were only 300 metres to the beach. Our staying was incredible and I highly recommend it!
This apartment is absolutely perfect for Tel Aviv! Close to everything - the beach, market, buses... everything!! The place was clean and air con in every room! Such a pleasure. Had the perfect time.
the location is outstanding. Very close to the beach and very close to famous carmel market.

We had a great stay. The location was perfect in the middle of the city 2 minutes walk to the beach and 2 minutes walk to the market (which is really important as grocery stores in Tel Aviv are super expensive and shopping in the market is much cheaper and more fun :). The hospitality was super - they let us have a later check out as there was no one checking in immediately after us and I even left my handbag there and they kept it safe and arranged for my friend to pick it up for me - they really took care of us :). Thank you ! :)

When we arrived in the apartment we were a little bit disappointed, as we expected a bigger and renovated apartment due to the pictures on Airbnb (even the furniture is partially different). The apartment is in need of renovation and reminds me on my studenthood. It was ok as we have been only a couple of guys. I would definitively not stay in the apartment with my girlfriend.

The biggest selling point of the apartment is it’s location, as the beach and local market is in walking distance! The communication with the host was also very good! Thanks for that.

This place is all about location. It’s was clean and dealing with the host was easy. It’s a short 2 block walk to the beach and the local playground is close enough to supervise your kids from your balcony.
Great location!

We realy enjoyed our stay in this apartment. The location is amazing. It's very close to the beach and the carmel market. The Rothschild-Boulevard is about 15 min walking distance. The Apartment is cozy and in a quite area. The host is realy nice. He helps you with everything.

Nice and friendly place.  Perfect for  going to the nearby Carmel Marcet and Shopping streets.  As well  the sea-side is walking distance 5 minutes.  Everybody around is friendly and helpful, the house is just in renovation and will become beautiful outside too.
Perfect location, great host! Recommended!
Great location. Close to everything. Has two balconies.

Really nice and charming place in the best area of Tel Aviv – on a calm street between the Carmel market and the beach. I recommend this apartment 100% to everyone. It's in one of those beautiful old building, but inside it's clean and recently renovated.  Nice balconies, good beds. Even though I did not meet Li personally, the communication was very easy. Even the cab back to the airport was organized.
El lugar esta bien ubicado, el apto esta limpio. El edificio es viejo y se escucha el ruido de los carros en la calle.

L'appart est très bien situé entre la plage (à deux rues) et le quartier du marché (Carmel, Allenby, Sheinkin, King George) à 5 minutes à pied où l'on trouve restos, magasins etc., et aussi plusieurs lignes de bus. J'ai adoré particulièrement les deux balcons d'où on peut observer le terrain de jeux/petit parc en face ou se mêlent des familles avec enfants et de beaux gosses qui font de l'exercice avec leur entraîneur ! La maison de deux étages (l'appart est au 2ème étage) dégage cette patine typiquement "telavivienne" - mais cela fait le charme de l'endroit. Le mobilier est fonctionnel, sans plus, l'endroit et propre. Je craignait le bruit de la rue (une seule voie en sens unique) qui passe juste devant les balcons, mais j'ai été agréablement surpris : la nuit, c'est assez calme, en journée et, il y a de la circulation, mais ça reste très supportable. J'y retournerait sans hésiter !

description: A 2.5 room apartment in the center of the city, in the area of Kerem Hatemanim.Includes kitchen, living room, bedroom, walk-in wardrobe, 2 showers, 2 bathrooms.Close to the Carmel Market, 3 minutes walk from the beach.Up to 4 people.The spaceExcellent location

reviews.comments: Hilda & Nadav's place was spotless and comfortable. Check in was smooth and easy, and Nadav was quick to respond to questions. The location was incredible too! Highly recommended.
Great stay in Tel Aviv for one week. Very accommodating host. I will come back

Good location, friendly host. It is probably worth being aware of a few things: ask for directions how to find the place as the entrance is on the side street was difficult to find. Secondly the bedroom doesn’t really have proper windows, only Curtains that cover a partial window a fourth the size of the window. It is very close to the beach but in the evening depending on where you go you have to go through the closed down market which was ok but not so comfortable for two females. We ended up taking a bit of a detour as we didn’t feel too safe walking the very dark alleys. Again not a huge issue but worth being aware of. Overall location is good. It has two bathrooms which is also good. It is cleanish but not squeaky clean like other flats we stayed in in TLV.   Especially the bathroom feels like it needs a bit of a proper deep cleanse. We didn’t use  (the Two!) TVs or sizeable kitchen but looked good. What’s nice is the little wardrobe like room where you can keep your suitcases. The size is good.

perfect for short/long stay in Tel Aviv . It is so clean and cozy , the best location near the beach and  market. Waking distance to every place that you want to go. I felt very safe the entire time . Nice Kitchen with everything you need. Hila and Meir was so responsive and helpful and kind ! I would come back again.
Everything was perfect, nice apartment in a great location and very good host, thank you for all Nadav & Hila.

name: Turquoise Duplex Suite in Old Jaffa
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.

description: Renovated apartment in a historic building in old Jaffa.Prime locaiton - 2 minute walk to the Flea Market, Clock Tower and many bars and restaurants.5 minute from the promenade and the old Jaffa Port.The apartment includes wifi, TV, air conditioning, a kitchen with a mini fridge and a Nespresso machine and a luxurious bathroom.There is a public parking lot nearby.The apartment is uniquely built, with original exposed bricks of the historic building, combined with a fresh, modern design.The apartment is located in the center of Old Jaffa, there are bars, restaurants, and ballrooms nearby so there might be some noise and music until midnight.

reviews.comments: Amazingly central location in Jaffa, and remarkably quiet despite all the restaurants and bars in the area. Easy check in and very responsive hosts. We had a great visit.
Highly recommend

The apartment was small but nice. The location is really wonderful, however there seems to be an event venue right next to it since one night we had to listen to very loud music of a wedding until well past 2am. It is also quite small so staying in the apartment for more than a few nights could become a bit claustrophobic. Since the flat seems to be built into an old basement there is basically no natural light and the smell is not the best and the air feels stuffy.

Apart from this we had a nice experience, since we only needed the room to sleep.

perfect apartment, perfect host, perfect location!
we enjoyed so much there.
only thing is that it is right next to a celebration hall so its super loud from about 8pm until at least 11pm every night.
מיקום מעולה, שירות נעים ומהיר!

description: Designed studio apartment in a BRABD NEW and RENOVATED building on a quiet and PASTORAL street in the CENTER of Tel Aviv.Located on the ground floor, with a small yard and a PLEASANT sitting area on a NICE and quiet street, a 10 minute walk from the BEACH, 2 minutes from Rabin square.The spaceThe apartment is located in a descending staircase that surrounds the building on the left. Outside the apartment there is a nice little garden where you can stay in pleasant days.Inside the studio there is a bed, TV, closet, sofa, small dining area, fully equipped kitchenette, toilet and shower.The apartment is fully decorated and furnished and is very spacious, pleasant and comfortable.Guest accessEverythingOther things to notePlease note that 17% VAT is applicable for any guest not entering the country on a Tourist (B2/B3) VISABreakfast is served in a Cafe near the apזזזartment and vouchers can be purchased at an additional charge.The apartment is on the ground floor and on hot summer days it is important to ensure closing of the windows and doors in order to prevent the entry of insects.There may be telephone reception problems in this apartment.

interaction: We are here to provide a response to every request, whether it is to get the visitor landed late at night, ordering at a restaurant, ordering a taxi, recommendations on events, exhibitions or concerts. If guests are showing interest, we are always happy to have a morning walk and tell the special history of the neighborhood.

reviews.comments:
I had a lovely stay at the apartment !
Good location and neighborhood
Best location in TLV

Great stay. Great customer service.

Had a little issue with the room not being ready but that was very quickly taken care of. Thank you Ori and team
Great host
Great place to stay!!

This is the perfect home for exploring Tel Aviv walking.

The are is filled with restaurant options, as well as several markets if you are in the mood for staying in and save some money.

The area is super local and quiet, something really valuable when in need of some rest.

The apartment itself is quite cozy and can’t think on anything to improve.
Good space in a fantastic location.  Great value.  Perfect for one or two people.
Second stay here and it was another great experience. Easy access. Very clean. Fantastic location on a quiet street.

Ori’s place is perfect for one or two people. It’s clean and very comfortable. It’s also located in a great area, convenient to the beach, restaurants, and shops. But it is also very quiet. Finally, the check in procedures are vey well done and easy to follow.
Ori's place was great. Quiet, comfortable, and a great location. He was very helpful through the entire check-in and check-out process. Thank you Ori!

Kind and responsive host who was available to quickly address  my questions and requests. The location is on a beautiful peaceful street, which is very close to a Tel-O-Bike stand, and a short walk to many cafes. Thank you Ori.
The best Air B and B I stayed in! Felt just like a local!!!!

it is a cute little place in a nice area. The place is clean and well maintained.
The host is very nice, professional and responsive.

The only thing is that the place doesn't have a lot of natural light, but it is to be expected on the ground floor.

Overall very recommanded.
Super good location and great host

Great place in a great location
Ori was a very warm-welcoming host.
clean and neet

very recommandable

The house was absolutely great! It was clean and exactly as I pictured and wished for it to be! The only thing I believe should be handled with is that there is no cellular connection in the apartment’s whole area, so the only way to communicate is via wifi.

This a very cute place for a short stay and a balanced price per what you get.
Not for a romantic weekend for a couple but more like a good base to travel the city.
Big plus is that it’s has bars and a good door so there’s no fear of leaving your valuables.

Great location and the yard is really nice! The studio is small, but has everything you need and for a studio the kitchen is good because it's kind of separated. Very quiet apartment. If you are planning to stay for too long, it's a very small refrigerator.
Bed and sofa not comfortable but overall we had a good stay

Really beautiful apartment in the center near to everything.
The only two minuses i noticed that there was a issue with a light in the bathroom but its probably because the lamp is burned and there was no cups for hot water.
Everything else was really amazing very good clean apartment
Great cosy apartment at the center of the city. Tiny bathroom and shower but other than that, good value for money.
Great place! great location. we had a problem with the TV and Ori came and fixed it immediately. The apartment is Cozy and small but with all you need. highly recommended.
Nice place
Great location
I enjoyed staying at this place. It's centrally located in a calm and pleasant street. The service was great, fast replies and regular cleaning without additional costs.
Great place at the center of tel aviv. Recomended
Good location and communication, clean

Ori and Omer have been great hosts with very big hearts. The design of the flat is great and so is its location. You have everything nearby - nice alleys with trees, bars with good coffee and a supermarket whicg has very good prices for israel. much recommended!
very nice place in the heart of Tel-Aviv.

depends on the room number. one apartment which I lived has NO WINDOW and it's like a basement. There's no proper place to wash face. And it requires the extra registration in there check-in system which is time-consuming. The host is really helpful and friendly.

Very centrally-located and close to a number of major places. An apartment is clean, not big, but cozy.
The hosts were very kind and welcoming. Thank you for having us!
This is a great find in a key location to shops, nightlife, (amazing food) and gorgeous beaches. The space is perfect for couples and will definitely stay here again.
well located, very reactive and nice hosts
Great place!

My experience was amazing!
Great apartment & great location !
Great location!

I was at Ori Flat for one week in november.. first thing to mention is the price i paid, definetely good value compared to the average in Tel Aviv.
The flat itself has been renovated on the area around the bed, not in the kitched nor in the bathroom which is old fashion .. but for the price paid i think it was ok.
The were some aspects of the flat and generally of my stay that weren't too fine but all in all it wasn't a bad experience.
The only real negative point was the cleaniness of the intere appartment, totally absent.. dirt, dust and head and body hair all over.. the flat hadn't been probably cleaned (at least properly) for a long time.. and as it was evening i didn't want to bother the owner and cleaned it by myself (i doubt at that time there could have been someone to do that anyway).
I also wrote this to Ori privately and hope he takes it as a good opportunity to improve its service towards his guests.
reviews.response:
Oscar Shalom
As I told you in our conversation, it is very unfortunate that you did not contact me when you arrived at the apartment and it was not to your satisfaction. I promise you, I would do anything (!!!) to improve your satisfaction.
So pity ...

You stayed in the apartment for a week.
Suppose there was dust or some dirt on your arrival, is this your general impression on the apartment ??
If that's how you rated the apartment, you should know, it's not ethical behavior...

reviews.comments: Everything was perfect, highly recommended!
Very good location! Ori did his best to help us in any question!

The location is great,very quiet.Ori and his colleague are very good hosts, very helpful and caring. I could ask them anytime. The communication was great. The apartment is fully equipped and has a very special style. The check-in was very easy. I would always recommend this place!!!

A fantastic apartment with a winning location, a few steps from the beach, high quality furniture, a new and charming apartment, well equipped! Extraordinary service! I've never encountered so kind hosts. My experience in Tel Aviv would have looked different if I had not come to this apartment. The apartment is more beautiful in reality than in pictures. Highly recommend!!!

name: Loginn: Super Studio with Kitchen & Balcony // 100m>beach ⭐
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals

description: ⭐ Brand new freshly renovated studio apartment with balcony and kitchen⭐ Perfect location at the famous Ben Yehuda Avenue⭐ Right next to the best cafes, restaurants, and bars Tel Aviv can offer.⭐ Supermarkets, shops, ATM, art galleries - 10 steps away⭐ 2 min walk from Bugrashov beach⭐ 24/7 Check-In and Online Support for anything you needThe spaceIncludes: ✔ High-speed WiFi  ✔ TV + Netflix✔ Private Balcony✔ Sitting area✔ Equipped mini-kitchen for basic cooking ✔ Nespresso coffee machine✔ Tea, coffee, sugar✔ Sheet & towels✔ Toilet paper, body soap, hand soap.Other things to note✌ This is an 15 SQM private studio apartment located on the 1st floor with a private kitchen, bathroom and balcony.✌ The final price refers to guests visiting Israel on a tourist visa (B2/B3/B4). Israeli passport holders, or guests who don't present a copy of their border control pass and passport, will be charged an additional 17% VAT. ✌Please note, the year 2021 will be accompanied by a lot of infrastructure work and railway construction in our area so there may be noises and disturbances during your stay, not on weekends. Apologies in advance for the noise✌ המחיר המוצג לא כולל מע"מ - בעלי אזרחות ישראלית יתבקשו להוסיף 17%
additional_house_rules:
● Enjoy 24/7 self log-in / log-out using a lockbox.
● Log-in after 15:00 // Log-out by 10:00.
● You're never left out, we're available 24/7 via phone & chat
● To keep our pricing competitive, we supply 1 set of towels and sheets per 1 cleaning fee paid.
● Dear smokers, please note there are fire alarms. So please- no indoor smoking, we'd hate to charge a damage fee of 100$ :(
● Please respect our neighbors and don't be too loud, especially after 23:00.
● The price shown on Airbnb refers to guests visiting Israel on a tourist visa (B2/B3/B4). Other guests, or guests who don't present a copy of their border control and government-issued ID, will be asked to pay an additional 17% VAT *prior to entering the apartment*.
● המחיר המוצג לא כולל מע"מ עבור אזרחי ותושבי ישראל. לאחר ביצוע ההזמנה תשלח אליכם בקשה לתשלום 17% מע"מ אותה תתבקשו להשלים בטרם הכניסה לדירה

••• We wish you a great stay, thank you for choosing us •••
interaction: Shalom everyone it’s Loginn ;)We’re here to make you feel like a local. Enjoy small spaces in the big city, incredible locations, a great local experience and an unbeatable value for your money.See you soon ♡

reviews.response: Hey, Gabriel! Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. It means so much when our best guests share their experiences. It’s unfortunate that you did experience the noise disturbance however that is the beauty of Tel Aviv. Tel Aviv is a lively city, there are a lot of things going around - transportation, construction, people walking by, etc. I totally understand it's not the most quiet city in the world but that's also a part of it's magic. Perhaps a room not facing the street would be a better future choice for you should you consider staying with us again

name: Deluxe Studio on Mapu Street
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.

description: סטודיו 20 מ"ר. קומה ראשונה. מואר ומאוורר. כירת בישול חשמלית. טלוויזית כבלים של YES. המחיר כולל את כל המיסים והחשבונות. וויפי מהיר ותקין.----------------Located on Mapu Street, a classic Tel Avivian side street, and places you in the heart of the action, between Ben Yehuda and Dizengoff streets, but with the peace and quiet of a local neighborhood.The spaceLocated on Mapu Street, a classic central Tel Aviv side street, this great apartment places you in the heart of the action, between Ben Yehuda and Dizengoff streets, but with the peace and quiet of a local neighborhood.  The perfect location is further complemented by being only a 350-meter walk from Frishman Beach, one of the most popular and buzzing seaside spots in the city.  The newly renovated studio is on the first floor, and its layout consists a double bed, kitchenette (including mini fridge-freezer, kettle, microwave, electric cooker and toaster). Amenities include air conditioning, free cable TV, free wireless internet and fresh bed linen and towels.  The studio shares an entrance hall with another studio, although is an independent unit with its own front door, private shower & kitchenette.Other things to note-The studio shares an entrance hall with another studio, although is an independent unit with its own front door, private shower & kitchenette.

reviews.comments: Place was great! Great location!

Prime location. Close to the beach as mentioned which is key! Enough space to get by and a responsive host.
Thanks for the stay.
Great place   Location is perfect and located close to beach, cafes and shops.  Yoav was a great host and very responsive.  Cute place for 1 or 2 people.  Would definitely stay here again.

The location is amazing and the place was clean enough and comfortable. However, one night I lost my key and was completely locked out of my apartment. I tried contacting Yoav several times with no response. Luckily I had a place to stay overnight, but I was concerned at the complete lack of communication on my host's end. I messaged him later again met with no response. In short, if you're looking for a small place with a good location this is the one. But if you hope to communicate with your host for advice or if you're in a jam, look somewhere else.
Beautiful apartment!
Super convenient and peaceful spot to explore the city

This studio apartment is in a great location, very easy to get around with public transportation and walking distance to awesome bars and restaurants. The place is very clean and has everything you need. Yoav was also very helpful, checking in periodically to see if I needed anything. Totally recommend, great value.
This place was perfect and in a great location. Yoav is so helpful and is very quick with responses!
Nice place. Centrally located, easy to work with, and good value. Amenities are a little basic but work for price
Great location! Cold shower.
Yoav was very responsive. The apartment is in a perfect location right in the center but on a quite street . The mattress was comfortable. But the apartment as a whole was tiny and a bit run down .

Great location near Frishman beach and Yoav is very easy to communicate with!
Tip: From the airport, Take the 445 bus from Terminal 3. Only costs 10 NIS (~$3 USD) vs 140-160 NIS (~$45 USD) in a cab/Gett.
A perfect location for your Tel Aviv trip! The apartment was very cute and perfect for our vacation needs. Perfect location to walk almost anywhere!

Water tasted and smelled horrible, although yoav tried to see what the issue was
It’s an incredible location and really affordable price — such a steal! Overall great and stunning place but for no more then 1-2 people.

Yoav's studio is a perfect choice. A clean space, close to the beach, quiet, and within walking distance to many bars and restaurants. I stayed four nights but could have stayed longer; I felt at home the whole time. There is plenty of storage for your clothes and luggage, a good refrigerator and AC, a comfortable bed, and a great shower. I would definitely recommend this studio and I would return myself on my next visit to Tel Aviv.

The perfect place in tel Aviv if you love the beach and the active scene on Dizengoff but prefer not to spend a lot on a fancy hotel. Quiet, comfortable, fridge and hot plate, and a fabulous location.
Great location!
Great location!
Yoav was an extremely responsive and helpful host. The apartment was comfortable, with all necessary amenities included.

Great location right in the heart of Tel Aviv.   Simple home, that has all the necessities and perfect for 2 people.

great location in Tel Aviv
close to the beach and everywhere
