Excellent location and a clean space. Very easy check in eperience.
An extremely well managed Airbnb, awesome location.

A lovely studio, in a terrific neighborhood within five minutes to the sea at Frishman Beach. Yoav couldn’t have been more helpful in every way;  more towels, recommendations, and answering local questions. He also runs a nice tourist information center nearby. We would stay here again for sure!
Great little place near Gordon beach. Easily accessible to restaurants, bars and the beach. Well priced, clean and easy to access. Thanks for a great stay!

Yoav’s very well-located studio apartment is true to its photos: It is bright and cheerful and has a handy kitchenette, including sink, microwave, and under-counter refrigerator. I especially appreciated the French press and electric tea kettle, and enjoyed having breakfast at the sunny round cafe table under the apartment’s tall windows each morning. The modern-style platform bed is super comfortable, and the indirect lighting is a nice touch. Perhaps best of all, the apartment is very well located, on a leafy side street just a few blocks from the beach. Yoav was very responsive to my requests and questions. He not only recommended a terrific fish restaurant for a dinner with guests my last night in Tel Aviv but also offered to make the reservation for us! I highly recommend Yoav’s charming studio for either single travelers or couples.

Yoav's studio is perfectly located - a ton of restaurants, coffee shops, the beach within two blocks - couldn't ask for more! The space itself is clean and modern. Yoav was responsive and helpful. Am glad we chose to stay in his place for the ease and great location!
Great location and nicely decorated apartment. Nice size for a couple. Apartment was clean but could use fresher linens and towels.
Great location and very responsive host. Check in and check out was super easy. Comfortable bed.

Knowing TLV very well, this is an awesome location. Quiet but central, just a few steps from Ben Yehuda street where you can find public transportation to other areas in TLV.
The apartment was easy to check into, private entrance with a mutual hall to 3 apartments. Yoav had a quick guide the table with all necessary info.
Communication was a breeze, he made sure we had all info prior to arrival and even helped us coordinate sim card drop off for us as we preordered it.
All in all, awesome stay. Totally recommended.
Thanks Yoav.

Yoav was extremely helpful and communicative. The apartment is in a great location and well appointed. There were however a few mishaps accessing wifi and water that were beyond his control but readily sorted out.

This is a private room & shower within an apartment and definitely not 'entire place'. So I found it over priced for what it is.
Although small, the room was very convenient and clean, had everything needed and Yoav was available 24/7. Also, the location is great.
reviews.response:
Thank you Roee for your review.
The studio contains also a private kitchenette inside it, and therefore provides everything of what our guests most often need.
We are sorry that we weren't able to meet all of your personal needs, but we were very happy to provide you with a late check out free of charge, and host your friend under the same booking.
Hope to see you again in Tel Aviv.
Best,
Yoav.

reviews.comments: Great location and the apartment is in the center of Tel Aviv! Yoav is really attentive and has great communication throughout the stay!

That apartment is as described: charming, well furnished, and very close to the beach, shopping, galleries, and public transport. Yoav is easy to reach and very responsive, as well as just a nice guy! Check-in and check-out were smooth and Yoav was flexible with the times. The apartment is between two main shopping streets so groceries and restaurants were within a quick walk. That apartment is away from the street and quiet, especially for Tel Aviv. I had a great time and highly recommend Yoav not only for the apartment but for his hospitality and insights into Tel Aviv (it was my first trip).
Great value for the perfect little studio with all the essentials.  Yoav knows about all the great local spots and gives great travel advice!!!

Yoav is a great host and responded to every phone call & text, this is when I misplaced the apt keys late in the evening .
great quiet street, minutes from Ben Yehuda & Dizingoff, plenty of choices for great restaurants.
Close to Gordon beach

I have been to Israel many times and lived in Ramat Aviv during the early 70's. More recently I've stayed at the Dan, Hilton, or David Intercontinental. Staying at Yoav's AirBNB was so much better than a hotel. He's a gracious host and the location is right near the center of Tel Aviv close to the beach. The apartment is a studio yet the bed, shower and kitchen were terrific. And I lived feeling like I lived in Tel Aviv instead of being a tourist. I would ask Yoav to stay again. And Ami will drive you back and forth to the airport for a reasonable price. This is my first AirBNB and I was very happy.

Yoav was an excellent host during my recent stay in Tel Aviv. He responded to my inquires very promptly and even provided information on services and attractions in the studio. I used his Taxi Driver, Mr. Ami, who was wonderful, to take me to the airport. The studio is in an great location, walking distance to Tel Aviv beach and many restaurants and shops. It was a perfect stay!

We had an amazing time at Yoav's apartment. It looked identical to the pictures and was very clean and comfortable. The location is great, only a few minutes to the beach and is close to many cool places to grab a bite or a drink. We extended our trip in Tel Aviv and Yoav seamlessly helped us book another one of his apartments. Thank you!

Yoav's place was perfect for my trip.  It is just a couple of blocks to the beautiful beach and there are many good restaurants in the area.  The apartment is clean and cozy, everything was in perfect working order.  Yoav was very attentive and helpful with my transportation needs.  Highly recommend

Thank you Yoav for hosting me.
I had a very nice experience staying at your place. I found it extremely well located, we'll kept and nicely decorated. I found my apartment to be contemporary and completely renovated with nice little details. It made my stay very comfortable and pleasant. I look forward to staying there again my next stay in Tel Aviv,
Yoav was very attentive every step of the way. The apartment was inviting, in an amazing location; accessible to night life and to the beach.

Quiet, clean and comfortable studio in an excellent location in Tel Aviv. I loved the Edison light bulbs and other stylish touches. Yoav was very responsive throughout our stay. A great deal, especially for longer stays.

It was a pleasure staying at Lavi's studio. It's a cute and clean apartment located a couple blocks from the beach. It's essentially a private studio/room within a larger apartment. You've got a kitchenette and breakfast table and excellent air conditioning. Lavi was also very responsive whenever I had questions.

We loved the apartment! It was cute, clean, and a great location. Yoav kept in touch really well, and we felt very welcomed. It also felt very safe with the locked entry into the public area, in addition to the lock on the apartment door. Bed was comfy, bathroom and kitchenette were both adorable. Great storage/closets. Easy, short walk to the beach, which was key. Great shopping (including pharmacy and food store) minutes away. No complaints!!

apartment clean and comfortable and a great location...easy walk to the beach.  A very basic simple kitchen.  Yoav has a folder full of information, and although we never met face to face, he left us a sweet gift bag of cookies on our departure!
Terrific apartment in a wonderful location. Close to shops, bars, restaurants and the beach!

Absolutely amazing flat. Clean and very silent, bearing in mind it's right in the centre.
The flat is 5 minutes walking from the beach and Yoav responds immediately and helps with everything you might need. The only thing personally for me that is missing is a washing machine, but only for longer stays, obviously.

I liked the place so much, couldn't leave and prolonged my stay. Thank you, Yoav.
Perfect location on a quiet street and very close to the beach.

Pros:
* Excellent location
* Everything you need for a holiday - bed, bathroom, small sitting area, closet, kitchen (fridge, microwave, portable stove), great AC, tv.
* Extremely easy check-in and check-out.
Cons:
* The dishes weren't very clean and there wasn't any cookware (pans/pots etc), so if you're planning on cooking you might want to ask for that ahead of time. Wasn't a deal breaker for us, we just ended up buying disposable plates.

Would recommend! Thank you!

It a nice small room, the location is great. We had hard time communicating with the host once we arrived to the apartment. It was quite late and the host didn’t pick up his phone, we almost went to search for an hotel. After more than 30 minutes trying to open the door, someone heard us and help us get in.
Clean and tidy. Has everything you would need for cooking or making a drink. The bed is comfortable. Overall nice place

This was an amazing spot for the price, such a great value. What is really great about this spot is that is very quite (super hard to find in Tel Aviv) and was the right amount of space for me. Really enjoyed it and would recommend for anyone looking for a good price.
Great place, great location. Everything as described.
Home away from home, best location in very nice and safe area. yoav is excellent eazy going host. We will be back ((:
Yoav suggests really comfortable flat for a decent price! The check-in process was smooth, the location is convenient!
TERRIBLE experience. Room was dirty with stains on the walls, old wood shower floor, urine on the WC and dirty towels. Try to avoid if you can!!!
Everything was perfect.
Good
It was a great stay in a great apartament!

Small but sufficient studio for short stay. However, needs renovation and proper maintenance/cleaning to be called "deluxe". At the moment that is really ironic. Mattress dirty, full of yellow staines, hair and dust. Bathroom dated, no water pressure. Host is living on his old glory looks like.
Good value for reasonable price
As good as a hotel room. Expect a similar experience as a hotel room.
Nice room and super location!
Yoav was extremely hospitable and the apartment was exactly as pictured and in a great position
The studio is in a central location and we were able to get quickly to all the spots we wanted to go to. Clean and easy to access. Thanks for the stay!
Fantastic stay!

Everything was perfect, Yoav was very reactive and communication was very good with him.

Just a little problem with hot water in the shower but maybe there was an explanation.

The studio is very well oriented and you are in a few steps from TLV center and beaches.

Thanks Yoav !

We spent 5 nights in this centrally located apartment. A little smaller than it appeared in the photos, it still had everything needed for two people for a short stay in Tel Aviv. The air conditioner was fabulous and much needed. We didn’t use the kitchen to cook but it seemed as if was set up for the basics. The bed was comfortable although it had a very thick quilt - I would have preferred a thinner blanket in the summer heat. Everything in Tel Aviv is expensive and so, although the apartment was a little tired looking, compared with the cost of basic hotel rooms it was value for money. The entrance to the apartment block looks very run down and smells a bit of “cat” but we soon got used to this and it seemed quite normal. The area is mostly residential and we always felt safe coming and going.
Amazing location close to everything and Yoav is really willing to help!

The communication with Yoav was easy and helpful. The check-in was also no problem. The only thing that disturbed my wife and me was that the smell of the room and the cleanliness. For more than €100 a night without breakfast we expected it to be spotless. In any case Yoav replied right away and apparently checked the room and had it cleaned. Nevertheless Tel Aviv was a great city to stay in and we enjoyed alot!
Check in/out was very easy, Yoav was very responsive and provided good advice. The flat is very well located, very convenient, perfect for a few days in Tel Aviv!

Yoav is very kind and reactif.
Location is great!!!
Yoav's place is perfectly located at 200m from the beach and less than 20mn walk from the Carmel market (even quicker with a scooter!). The place is clean and sunny. I recommend!

Great location in Tel Aviv. Communication was efficient and check in / out details were very easy to follow. One of the towels provided was stained but hopefully this will be rectified in future. There is a shared common hallway with 2 other apartments which I didn’t expect. Air con and other amenities worked well. Overall a good stay for the price.
It was fine. The best of the place... the location.

Very good location
Very nice and easy check in/out

Very convenient place, just meters from the beach and from a bus stop!
Yoav was very flexible and responsive :)
Professional Set-Up, easy check-in/check-out, Location is great.
Great location. Perfect  studio for a short stay. Everything as described. Host super responsive and helpful. Def recommend.

We stayed at Yoavs for 4 nights and had a pleasant stay. Unfortunately the weather was really bad and there is no heater in the Appartement (typical for TLV), but with the air-con turned on heat the Appartement warms up immediately. The air in the Appartement is a bit humid though.

The Appartement is equipped with everything you need - bedsheets, towels, shower gel, etc. The shower didn’t work the first day (only really cold water) but Yoav managed to fix it immediately.

The location of the Appartement is unique - super close to the beach on one hand and also super close to many shops, restaurants and sights - we walked everywhere from there. Yoav provided a list at the Appartement with the closest shops, supermarket, moneyexchange, etc. and answered all our questions within a few minutes.

It's a great location. Close to the beach, Dizengoff Square and Center with all it's shops, cafes and restaurants. About 20 minutes walk to the newly renovated old port area with bars and restaurants. We even walked to Jaffa in about 45minutes. If you find this too far you can also grab the bus or rent a bike nearby.

My husband and I stayed 10 days at Yoav’s place. The apartment is perfectly located for food (really good restaurants), drinks and shopping, close to Dizengoff Street and you just need to walk 5 min to the beach.
Yoav was a very helpful and nice host :)

If I had to point something out
It would be that the neighbors were a bit noisy and maybe not as clean as it could be.

The location is PERFECT. Quiet street but just a block away from the main shopping/bars/public transport artery - Dizengoff st.
The apartment is very nice and comfy for a couple. Two heaters (bathroom and bedroom) makes the place warm during the winter time. My tip for guests - bring slippers or flip flops since the floor can be very cold during winter.
Bed is comfy. Convenient closet to put your things. Apartment is very clean, plenty of towels (and even the bar of soap). Everything is well thought of - heater in the bathroom, insect mesh on the window, air conditioning, plenty of lights.
I'd definitely recommend it to a couple for a few days visit to Israel.
Do not hesitate to contact the host Yoav if you have any questions, he's very helpful and reacts immediately. Thanks, Yoav!
Great studio apartment in the best location in Tel Aviv.

Let’s start with the important things.
Was it clean? Yes it was.
Was it comfortable? Yes it was.
Is it well situated? Yes. Less than 5 minutes to the beach and 15 minutes to the town centre,by foot.
On top off all this the host is extremely helpful and friendly providing generous personal touches.
Highly recommend.
Great location, nice and clean appartement. Communication with Yoav was very friendly and fast. Highly recommended.
Quiet and leafy street with a small and well equipped flat. Yoav was very helpful with all our plans and needs. We would stay again!

Yoav is an amazing host! Super helpful and communicative. The apartment was clean, everything that was described was there. The apartment is perfectly located for Shopping, public transport and good restaurants. All easy to reach. Definitely a recommendation for your stay in Tel Aviv!
Nice place, good location, easy and quick check-in and check-out. We had a very good stay!
Clean and tidy, well-equipped.
Easily accessible, clear instructions, accurate description & photos, extra towels a huge bonus, table & chairs need updating.
Small apt with older b good
Yoav was a great host, he was very fast to answer and a great help during yum Kippour
Amazing location! Yoav is very attentive!

Great location!
Excellent checking service and host!
Highly recommend!
Perfect. As advertised.
Very good host and apartment very well located

great localisation in tel aviv, ideal to discover the city and really nearby the beach ! appartment very confortable with everything for basic needs. Very nice decoration. I will come back with no hesitation!
Great place.  5 minute walk to the beach.  Very central.  Loved Tel Aviv and would definitely stay here again!
Nice cosy place. Close to the beach.

The location is perfect - 5 minutes walk to the beach. There is a small kitchenette which we used to prepare breakfast but of course wanted to eat out most of the time. Yoav was very quick to respond to messages and even booked us a restaurant when the website wasn’t in English. It’s self check-in which makes everything efficient!

This flat is amazing for a short stay for anyone who want to be in the center of Tel Aviv ! My stay was amazing the apartment is clean and new, very well located. Even if we didn’t meet yoav he was at our disposal and very easy to contact ! Thanks I’ll definitely come back
Amazing location in the heart of Tel Aviv.

Yoavs apartment is just a 15m2 room- not an apartment. the price is too high for the quality that is offered. there are better options. we had just cold water in the shower for 2 days, some of the towels smelled really bad- but looked okay. the apartment smelled mouldy when we entered.
reviews.response:
Thank you Sabine for your feedback.
Indeed the *studio* you have booked is 20M2 sized, as written clearly in the description, and not a spacious apartment.
We are a bit disappointed that you did not informed us, with the problems you encountered during your stay, as we would have happily resolve them on spot.
Hopefully next time.
Thank you for your stay.

Yoav

reviews.comments: Nice studio in a great location near the beach and bars/restaurants at Dizengoff Square.

We (couple) stayed two nights at Yoav’s place. It’s tastfully decorated and has a very comfortable bed! :-)
The area is very nice as well cause you just need to walk 5 min to the beach or the lively Dizengoff street for drinks, food or shopping.
Yoav was a very helpfull host and always responded very fast!
I highly recommed to stay there!
Nice appartement in a good location. Very friendly and quick responding host.
It was really nice to stay in your beautiful aprtament. So close to the beach :)
Great location. Good communication with hosts.

Yoav & Assaf were very helpfull and kind. They gave us a lot of good tips for Tel aviv.
The apartment was comfortable and was very centrally.

I loved Israel! - And Yoav's apartment was the right place to stay :)  - Although a little bit tiny for 2 pers. it was just enough for us - you can easily walk to the beach or Dizengoff - there's even a rooftop on the very house. Enjoy!
Great location! Studio has plenty of the amenities you will need and it is a good size.
Very nice studio, well located and clean. Yoav was an excellent host, very kind and caring. Definitely suggested!

Location. Location. Location. If you’re looking for a place in Tel Aviv really close to the sea shore, all of city’s attractions, great restaurants and cafés, this is the place to choose! The studio may seem small but it’s cozy and very calm. Yoav is a great host, responsive and helpful, who takes into account whatever request comes from visitors. If we are back to Tel Aviv someday, we’ll be happy to stay at Yoav’s again.
Superb location and easy check-in instructions!

I found the studio excellent and as expected. It was a great location, close to the beach and restaurants, and I was able to get a good nights sleep throughout my stay on what I found to be a comfy bed. The flat was spotless and there were tips provided regarding local amenities. I would happily stay here again.

Great little place with everything you need, perfectly situated! Really close to the beach, right next to the area around dizengoff, tons of great cafés, bars, restaurants. Yoav gave us sone great recommendations for the area, also everything went super smooth. Highly recommended!

I never met Yoav as his instructions were straightforward.
Studio is in a great location between Ben Yehuda & Dizengof.
5-10 minutes walk to beach .
Everything works in the unit - Air con, hot water etc. Comfortable bed.
Perfect for 1 or 2 people. Pricey but that's Tel Aviv.
Tip . If you don't have much luggage , train & bus here from airport about 20shekels
The location was excellent - a quick stroll to the beach, and an easy bus journey to anywhere in Tel Aviv!

Yoav is an excellent host and the apartment is very central both to restaurant's and the beach. Yoav was easy to contact and very helpful in all matters. The place is very clean, tidy and has the things you need to sleep well and cook easier meals. We were a couple staying here 10 days and would say its perfect for longer couple weekends etc. I would really recommend it!
Amazing location, so close to beach and all the great bars and restaurants but tucked nicely down a side street, so it's still quiet at night. I highly recommend.
Studio well located. easy check in - check out. Yoav reachable for any problem you may have and concern about your stay.
Great location and comfortable room. Yoav is very responsive, accommodating, and easy to reach. Would stay here again!
Perfect located flat in a quiet area. Yoav was really helpful and kind! We had absolutely all what was necessary in the flat. I would come again, Tel Aviv is great.
Yoav is a real profesional. I recommand him without any doubt
This is a good place to stay in, a calm street, near the beach and still it is in the city. The room is small but have everything you need like a kitchenett and a bathroom.

We felt very comfortable staying at the apartment. From the start (comunication and check in) went very smooth and easy. It was quiet and the bed was very comfy therefore we had wonderful relaxing nights. At the same time restaurants, bars and the beach are within a short walking distance, very convenient. Loved it. Totally can recommend it.

I never did a chance to meet Yoav but the studio was easy to find and easy to check in. The room was a bit smaller then I expected but equipped with everything you could need for a short stay. Great bed, nice bathroom and small kitchenette.

The location is great to stroll the beach and and close to all kinds of shopping and restaurants.

Yoav is a very kindly host. It was a pleasure to be in contact with him. He answered directly and seem really to care about your comfort. The apartment was clean and and the furniture had a fresh/ kind of Hipster- Design, which i like. In the last day, i asked Yoav to book one day more because i thought the flight will be one day later, which was a mistake. Yoav wasn´t upset with my storno,- that i also aprecciate. All in all i really recommend this appartment. I am grateful for everything!
The location of the apartment is great
Nice studio , comfortable and clean in a very very good location in tel aviv 5 minutes from everywhere worthwhile :-) yoav is helpful and accessible if you need something :-)

I was surprised to know that the apartment was a room inside an apartment ... The ad speaks in an entire studio or apartment ... despite the convenience of the electronic check in, at no time did I meet Yoav ... Some kitchen accessories, Like the stove, completely full and stuck with fat ... the bed and bathroom are good. The best is the location ...
reviews.response:
Thank you Ilan for your review!
We take guests review very seriously, in to the favor of our or future guests.
I'm sorry you didn't find the studio matching to your personal standards.
Please allow me to accurate a few points:
The studio is not 'a room'. It is an independent unit with its private door, private kitchenette, and private toilet&shower.
Yes, you do share a main door with another studio as *clearly written* in our description, and as also *clearly written* in the email you received from us, one week prior to your arrival.
In reference to the kitchen accessories, thank you for your feedback, my apologies, we will make sure to change that.
Please note Ilan, that during your stay, i have tried many times to contact you, asking if anything is missing or needed, while you chose not to reply at all.
I would have been very happy to make you stay more enjoyable and fix issues on the spot, and not facing them for the first time, in this public review.
This is very disappointing, but we thank you for also pointing out the great advantages of our beloved studio, and hope to see you again in Tel Aviv!
Best,
Yoav

reviews.comments:
Great studio in the heart of Tel Aviv - walking distance from the beach and all the trendy shops,bars and restaurants.
Although being very central the studio is really calm and you get awaken by birds singing in the morning.
Yoav was extremely available and professionnal which made our stay perfect.
I highly recommended and will certainly keep this address for my next visits in Tel Aviv!

The small apartment is very nice and has a great location near to everything! Yoav gave us all information before the arrival and made it possible to check-in earlier. We got also a list with personal tipps for our stay from Yoav per e-mail. So we had a great time and we absouletly recommend to stay in the Deluxe Studio on Mapu Street.
Yoav is a fabulous host- very communicative. The studio is very clean and is perfect for a holiday. Great location- close to beach and great cafes and restaurants. Thanks yoav!

This is the ideal place for a couple or single visiting Tel Aviv. Excellent location (5 min walk to the beach and within walking distance of most areas), very clean and a very comfortable bed. The bonus is the host Yoav, who was so helpful with everything, from restaurant tips, organising taxis and even allowing a late check-out because we had a late flight. Would definitely stay again.

Our stay at Yoav's place was just perfect! He was very kind and helpful as we had problems with our baggage. And a lot of recommendations we got were really helpful! The apartment is sweet and nice and perfect for 2 people, 3 minutes to the beach, a lot of restaurants and bars around. We would come again!:)

Yoav was a perfect and super easy host. Check in in the middle of the night and check out in the afternoon was even posible which gave us the opportunity to make the most of our holidays. The Apt is located in the best area in Tel Aviv if you want to enjoy the beach, shopping and restraurants at the same time.
Yoav was a great host, he made our stay unforgettable. The Studio was clean and in a perfect location. The communication with Yoav was very easy.

The studio was perfect - more like a hotel room than an apartment. Everything was clean and well-maintained and Yoav did everything to make sure our arrival/departure was as easy as possible.

The neighbourhood is great and the flat is within a couple of minutes walk from the beach, and from a number of great streets for eating and drinking.
It was a lovely place. Yoav was very easy to communicate with.
The apartment have great location close to the beach and in nice quiet neighbourhood. Very modern and really cozy. Happy for staying there and can be highly recommended.

Yoav was very friendly, approachable, and happy to help in whatever way possible.  The studio is really well located in a great area. The bed is comfortable, the shower is good, and you get a room in a house with your own lock and key. Yoav looked after every request we had, and was happy to sort out any problems. Thanks Yoav!

The appartment is nice, clean, new renovated and very well located. The check in and out and the airport taxi service was very well organized.
I met Yoav just for a short chat, but he is a very friendly guy.
I would definitely recommend this apartment for a stay in Tel Aviv.

Nice modern studio with great location !
Very convinient check in and check out
Friendly host
Nice modern studio with great location, very convinient check-in/out and friendly host!

The place place was great, well designed and very conveniently located. Yoav was very responsive when there was a water issue (which was quite late at night), and other than that my stay was perfect.
Will definitely stay there again on my next visit.
Yoav's flat was very nicely prepared, very clean and furnished with an eye for design and detail. Nice neighborhood in the north of Tel Aviv. I can fully recommend staying there.
Very nice & cosy place, only minutes away from the beach and Dizengoff Street. Clean and functional -- highly recommended.

Perfect! Very well located, clean and cosy. The host is very kind and helps you If you have any problem. I was with my 4 years child and we felt safe and comfort. The transfer from The airport was perfect. We will come back for sure!

Great location, the apartment was just as the photos and what we expected. Super clean and well furnished. Yoav was in touch with us during our stay to make sure everything was ok.
He let us do a late check out which was awesome. We even stayed an extra night.

Beautiful studio apartment as described. Large, comfortable bed. Clean and quiet.
Excellent location, quick walk to both beach as well as bars/restaurants.
Easy check in and check out.
I would stay here again and would recommend to my friends

The apartment was great, very well located and displayed exactly as in the photos. Yoav is a very nice host (A *****), very accommodating. Yoav organized a perfect pick-up-service from the airport. Will love to come back

We had a great time.
Nice cozy clean appartment, very good located!

Thank you, Yoav for your help and care.

Lovely apartment with everything you need! Central and near the beach, clean and comfortable, I highly recommend it :)
Big thank you to Yoav, who was a very thoughtful host, always ready to help!

Wonderfully appointed apartment in the heart of TLV - close to the beach, shops and other attractions. Yoav is an excellent host always attentive and ready to help. Definitely an awesome place to stay!
The studio was very nice and clean! We had a great time at this place, very close to the beach and very luminous :-)

A perfectly situated studio apartment within walking distance to major points of interest. Yoav our host was exemplary. We had a small problem with the hot water that he had rectified within 15 minutes. Although small, the studio is big enough for a couple. It is clean and is stocked with fresh sheets, towels and basic kitchen utensils. We have no hesitation in recommending this studio to a single person or couple. We would book with Yoav again.
The reservation was canceled 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I really enjoyed to stay in this apartment. The apartment was a really good deal - Clean and very well located.
Yoav, was really helpful and the communication with him was really good.

Good quality price. Clean apartment.
Yoav was an amazing host. Accommodating.
We will book an apartment with him next time we come to TLV.

Yoav was an excellent host ! The appartement is quite big, clean and extremely well situated ! The appartment is located on a quiet street.
Yoav is a very friendly and very helpful person !

Thank you very much, I would definitly come back again in the future !

Yoav's place is in a great location.  It is steps to the beach.  The building is quiet and is only one flight of steps to get to.  The size of the apartment is quite large and the small balcony was great.  The pictures are accurate.  The only good thing to know is that the bathroom shower is low so it can be a bit uncomfortable if you are tall.  The kitchen has enough supplies to cook simple meals.  Yoav was a great host!  He was available if we needed him and supplied us with extra towels and sheets.  Overall, a good place.
We had a pleasent stay despite the fact that the bathroom was somewhat unconfortable. Yoav an Guy are attentive hosts

הדירה נמצאת במיקום מעולה, רחוב שקט, שכנים שקטים. קרוב לים , למרכז תל אביב ולמקומות בילוי . הדירה/סטודיו משופצת כחדשה ,מעוצבת בטוב טעם ומתוחזקת יפה. סטודיו ברמה של חדר במלון 4 כוכבים , יש בה הכל.  נהניתי מאד.
מאד נהננו
אחלה
סגרתי מהרגע להרגע, יואב היה זמין ועזר בכל מה שהייתי צריכה, הדירה ממוקמת במיקום מעולה ונהנתי מכל רגע, אין ספק שאחזור שוב לדירה.
החדר שהזמנתי היה מעל למצופה ובמיקום מצוין..
Studio très agréable très bien placé, à 3 minutes de la plage, nous avons pu tout faire à pied. De plus Yoav a gentiment accepté que l’on quitte l’appartement à 13h au lieu de 11h.
הדירה נמצאת במיקום מושלם הכל נמצא במרחק הליכה קצר, מעבר לזה בדירה הייתה מאוד נקייה ונתנה הרגשה של חמימות....בטוח שאחזור לשם בקרוב
Centralt beliggende. Rent. Stille og roligt kvarter. Vi var glade for at bo der.
Il faut s’attendre à être à l’étroit .

Cental beläget, men mycket lugn och tyst gata.
Rekommenderas !

Fotos entsprechen leider nicht dem wirklichen Zustand der Wohnung.
Im Apartment roch es ziemlich modrig, im Bad gab es auch Schimmel. Bettlaken, Dusche, WC- Bürste und Boden waren ebenfalls schmutzig. Wir waren von der Wohnung insgesamt ziemlich enttäuscht. Alles in Allem kann man es in der Wohnung gut ein paar Tage aushalten, wenn man Abstriche macht und die Erwartungen etwas reduziert. Preis- Leistungsverhältnis sollte dann aber angepasst werden.
Die Lage ist super, man kann alles fußläufig erreichen.

Kleines und charmantes Apartment in bester Lage. In wenigen Minuten ist man am wunderschönen Strand und auch alles weitere relevante ist angenehm fußläufig zu erreichen. Wie auf den Bildern zu erkennen verfügt die Küche nicht über einen Herd, sondern nur über eine Kochplatte, diese eignet sich nicht wirklich zum zubereiten größerer Mahlzeiten, dies ist aber bei der Fülle an guten Restaurants in der Gegend auch eher sekundär.

Yoav ist ein super Host, der schnell auf Anfragen reagiert und einige gute lokale Tipps offerieren konnte.
Lage, Preis-Leistung, Sauberkeit, Kommunikation alles super! Besonders die Lage ist wirklich unschlagbar - zwischen Strand und Dizengoff Street - perfekt!

Israel en daarmee Tel Aviv kan duur zijn qua hotels. Bespaar je geld en kies voor een leuke Airbnb zoals deze. Leuke locatie in een hippe wijk. In de directe omgeving diverse leuke koffiezaken voor ontbijt. Ons is het verblijf goed bevallen en de verhuurder communiceert keurig

Endroit parfaitement bien situé à deux de la mer, des boutiques et restaurants dans une rue calme. Petit studio bien agencé et confortable. Yoav est réactif à toutes demandes et est charmant. Une adresse à recommander!
on a passé un séjour très agréable au coeur de la ville. Merci.
Хороший, бюджетный вариант. Отличный хозяин.

Yoav ist ein sehr netter Gastgeber, der sich oft gemeldet hat und nachgefragt hat, ob alles passt. Das Zimmer war fein und schön, alles da und funktionierend. Die Dusche läuft etwas aus, darum war der Boden im Bad permanent nass.

Le studio de Yoav est un enchantement !
Son acceuil est tres agréable car il est toujours disponible.
Ce studio tres central est tres lumineux moderne , tres bien agencé: cuisine tv salle de bain tres moderne ..
Je le recommande vivement à tout touriste à le recherche d un lieu central et sans bruit rare à Tel Aviv.

Alles war wunderbar! Yaov hat uns jederzeit gut informiert und das Appartement ist sehr gut gelegen und gut ausgestattet. (Ohropax schaden aber nicht. ;))
Nur wenige Gehminuten zum Strand und eine wirklich nette Gegend.
Absolute Empfehlung!

Le studio est très fonctionnel , très bien placé pour visiter et sortir le tout à pied, le prix est très raisonnable..Yoav a très bien précisé les modalités de fonctionnement avant le séjour, il nous a permis de libérer le studio plus tard que l'heure prévue. De plus nous avons eu la chance de le rencontrer à notre départ, il est très charmant. Bref top top top.. Allez y les yeux fermés

Chez Yoav, on profite pleinement de Tel-Aviv, idéalement situé face à la plage Gordon, entre Benyehuda St et Dizengoff, on est à 5 minutes de tout : supermarché, café/restaurant, centre commercial, station de location de vélo/voiture... On peut manger à toutes les heures dans le quartier, en toute sécurité, population jeune et familiale. L'appartement est fidèle aux photos, climatisé et confortable. Yoav est amical et hyper serviable. Toutes les informations pour visiter, manger ou se divertir sont disponibles. Yoav peut également se rendre disponible pour toute demande particulière. Il nous a organisé les transferts entre l'aéroport et le studio, avec ponctualité et tarif spécial. Les habitants de Tel-Aviv sont accueillants, souriants et amicaux. Je recommande Yoav, c'est un atout pour un séjour réussi !!
reviews.response: Thank you Shaniss for your kind review, much appreciated! Yoav

reviews.comments: Студия чистая и уютная, очень удобно расположена. Йоав оперативно реагировал на все возникающие у нас вопросы. Очень удобная система заезда, поскольку нет необходимости быть привязанным к определенному времени для встречи с хозяином. Йоав был так любезен, что разрешил нам за умеренную плату остаться в студии до вечера, т.к. у нас был ночной вылет. Мы остались довольны поездкой!

name: Lovely apartment on ROTHSCHILD Boulevard
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Private entrance - Separate street or building entrance
Elevator - The home or building has an elevator that’s at least 52 inches deep and a doorway at least 32 inches wide.
Single level home - No stairs in home
Luggage dropoff allowed - For guests' convenience when they have early arrival or late departure
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: סטודיו 20 מ"ר. קומה ראשונה. מואר ומאוורר. טלוויזית של YES. המחיר כולל את כל המיסים והחשבונות. וויפי תקין. הבניין בשדרות רוטשילד סמוך ל'הבימה'.Quiet airy self-contained studio apartment, on first floor of traditional residential building with elevator. Located a stone's throw away from Habima square, at the top end of the beautiful tree -lined Rothschild Boulevard, in the “Heart of Tel Aviv” area of the city!The spaceThe studio also contains a purified boiling and ice cold water dispenser.Coffee shops restaurants and bars are right on the door step and a wonderful bakery plus good food shopping within a two to three minute walk. It is within walking distance of most of the major Tel Aviv attractions and the beach.-Please do read the 'other things to note' section.Guest access- We are happy to arrange Airport Pickup Service:The airport pickup service is available for up to 4 people at a total cost of 180 shekels, (and up to 6 people at a total cost of 250 shekels)The price of this service is commission free, and matches the price you would be offered by local taxi drivers in the airport.If you would like to take advantage of the airport pickup service, please advise us of your:Flight numberLanding dayLanding timeCell phone numberWe will confirm that the service has been booked.

reviews.comments: Great studio apartment in the heart if Tel-Aviv. Communicative host, addresses an issue quickly and effectively. Will definitely go back.
Best location in Tel Aviv, and best value for money! The apartment is super clean, the owner is very responsive and accommodating, and overall a great experience. Will definitely come back again.

I have stayed in many AirBnBs before, including in Tel Aviv, and this was by far the worst experience I had. overpriced space, owned by a person who couldn't care less about hosting. The place was dirty when we arrived, and when I complained the "host" he said: "seems like you are not pleased. Would you like to leave and get a refund?". Finding a spot in Tel Aviv is hard, how detached from reality one has to be to offer that to their paying customers?. I put host in quotation marks because this guy does not care about hosting, not in the standard I know from airbnb anyway. The best and only good part about the unit is the filtered water. Though the filter itself is so dirty and moldy it seems unsanitary.
Don't waste your money here. This place is not worth your money. It is completely overpriced and unmainatined. The AC drips, the shower is gross and dirty, the towels were not clean (thankfully my mother lives in the area so she gave me towels). The only reason I stayed was because I didnt want to waste my trip on searching for new accommodation options and being on the phone with AirBnB.
It's small, but very nice and homey

Yoav's place is great! Excellent, central location in the city and the apartment itself was clean and quiet with a comfortable bed, plenty of heat and hot water and relevant amenities. Yoav was very responsive to my messages and the checkin and checkout experience was smooth as well.
I stayed with my wife for a week and we really liked the studio. It was clean, easy check-in and check-out. The location was great!
Cozy apartment at a great location. Recommended!
Centrally located in the heart of Tel-Aviv yet quiet. This is a great studio for a single business traveler.
Host is a real professional, check in was easy and location is second to none

A great small apt in a very lovely location. Near the music and theatre center. Lovely eating places , great coffee houses all around , seeing people walking with their dogs , feeling comfortable wearing what they want , just a joy to watch them . Yoav is a great host and when the remote control needed to be changed he took care of it.i hope to be back at Yoav’s place again
Thank you Yoav
Oh ,I just will need a little more light and a shower mat for my next stay .

Travelled for business and stayed at Yoav's. Great location and very functional apartment.  I would recommend for solo or business travelers looking for central location with easy access to all of Tel Aviv. Overall a good value.
A great simple place near the action on Rothschild.
Be aware there is a 50 Euro cleaning fee assessed after check in

Good clean place, very central location. No laundry, but there's a laundromat about 10 minutes away. Perfect for any stay if you don't need too many amenities but want a great location in the heart of Tel Aviv.

The highlights for me in this cute space were the air conditioner (felt amazing as we were there the first week of June when it was really hot), water boiler (might not matter to whoever is reading this, but I drink tea everywhere I go so this I loved), and the location. You can easily walk to lots of places without having to call a taxi.

One thing to note about this space is that you have to sweep the water in the shower (there's a squeegee looking mop provided) to the drain once you are done since it doesn't easily go down, and there is also no electrical plug in the bathroom, so if you need to use a hair dryer, you have to plug in your dryer to the outlet underneath the tv.

Overall I would stay here again if I'm in Tel Aviv.
Quiet, clean building and Best location to go out and party on Rothschild Blvd. Center of city. Small studio, perfect for a budget stay. Great air conditioning.
Very comfortable apartment in the center of town. Would definitely stay here again. Great place!

I had a great stay at Yoav’s apartment. It is located very centrally. It was very clean and just as pictured, a great place for 1-2 people. And Yoav was very helpful with the easy self checkin process, local tips, and help with arranging airport pickup. all and all, a great stay!
Literally, the best location in Tel Aviv. Central to everything. Clean and cute apt. Excellent communication w host.

Yoav was an excellent host. Very responsive and helpful. The flat is located on Rothschild St and very close to Habima Theater - you can't ask for a better location! The flat looks exactly like the photos. I felt right at  home. This is the perfect place for your Tel Aviv adventure.

Great stay here! The place was clean, comfortable and quiet. The building is nice and in a great location. Instructions to get into the apartment were very straightforward and easy, and I didn't have to reach out to Yoav for anything because I had everything I needed already. Definitely recommending this place to friends and planning to stay here again in the future. Thanks for all, Yoav!
Great place!

Very clean and comfortable studio apartment in the very desired area. Plenty cafes , restaurants and clubs around. Very pleasant neighborhood. Very easy communication line with the owner.
Definitely would use it again and recommend this place to others.
Great location! Easy to check in. Clean comfortable place

Yoav’s place was clean, comfortable, and very centrally located.  I walked everywhere (20-30 minutes max), though there was a bus stop right down the block if you are going farther/not a walker, and public bike docks nearby.  The beach is about 20 minutes at the closest point; bars and restaurants as close as 5 minutes.  The “main” going out section of Rothschild Blvd is about 15 minute walking to the other end of the street.   It was really quiet with almost no street noise and no noise from other apartments.  If you have a lot of clothes to hang, or are a couple, maybe ask for some more hangers (I stayed a week and doubled up on a few, but I was there 7 nights and probably overpacked ).  There was only instant coffee and no coffee maker, which I didn't realize, so just something to note if you like your coffee first thing in the morning.  It was nice to have the water dispenser.  There were some problems with the wifi, but Yoav was very responsive and took care of the issues quickly.   I also bought an Israeli sim card with data, so it was less of a problem than it could have been.    He was very quick to reply to any other misc questions that I had. Self check-in and checkout were super easy with no issues.  The one negative is that the bathroom has a bad mildew smell.  It isn’t horrible, but it is unpleasant.  There is no window in the bathroom, so I am not sure how this can be addressed.  Overall, I would definitely recommend.
Great place, right in the middle of everything. The place is exactly as showed in the photos. Host is very responsive, nice and pleasant, and very helpful. Totally recommend!
This is the perfect place for a solo traveler or couple, great location in central Tel Aviv, Yoav was beyond helpful and made the trip seamless. Would highly recommend

Pros: The apartment is very well located right next to the bima and it is a renovated clean studio. The host was very responsive and check in was a breeze.

Cons: We thought that the bed was too small for a couple (in length and in width) and there weren't enough pillows. Also there was no shampoo. The shower and the toilet are next to each other, which causes the shower to spray water on the toilet area. The bathroom also has a bad smell.
reviews.response:
Thank you Asaf for your review.
I'm surprised to realize, you had things missing or needed during your stay, which you didn't share with me, although i asked you every several days how have you been.
I would have happily supply extra pillows and shampoo, on the spot.
I'm happy at least I had the chance to at offer late Check-out free of charge, and send you on your way, with a smile.
Hope to have the opportunity to see you again in Tel Aviv :)
Best,
Yoav

reviews.comments: good value, great location.
Enjoyable stay, great location, nice studio!
Yoav’s place is great! I stayed for a week and was satisfied with pretty much everything. Yoav was very responsive and made sure I’ll enjoy my staying.
Good apartment in the center of Tel Aviv. Really close to everything.
A simple flat in an excellent location, excellent value. Very clean and pleasant. Very nice and helpful host. Ask the host about cooking options, they are limited.

Yoav was a great host, he responds quickly to messages and was always helpful with everything we needed. The apartment was clean and easy to get to and from places around the city (great location), will definitely recommend!
This place is in a great position on Rothschild boulevard, very clean, comfy bed, close to bus stop, walking distance to loads of shops, cafes and malls
good stay

We had a great time in Tel Aviv, Yoavs apartment is a spacious 1 room apartment, perfect for a couple. The location on the upper end of Rothschild Boulevard is very central and you have everything in the close neighborhood and you can easily explore the city with the scooter.
Rothschild boulevard can be busy during the day, but generally there is few traffic at night.
Yoav was very helpful, when our luggage didn't arrive and helped us solve the problem.

Yoav was a great host, communication was fast and always helpful. We could even leave our luggage in a place he provided. The apartment was located very well, close to Habima Square. The only downsides were a not so nice shower cabin, and the moist smell some others already have mentioned. Overall a very good value for money.
Clean, very well located apartment! Yoav was responding fast and very accommodating.
Very good location.

Actually, one of my best airbnb experiences. Great value for money. The room was excellent. The location is great and Yoav was really helpful and friendly. Check in and check out was very convenient and easy,  Yoav let us to check in earlier and check out later. We'd love to stay more.

Great location, clean and tidy apartment. However, the lighting in the apartment is too weak. I’d recommend the place solely if you want to only sleep in the apartment and spend most of your time outside in the city.
thanks

We had an amazing time staying at Yoav's place. The location of the apartment is perfect, close to everything like the beach and shopping opportunities as well as restaurants and bars. Yoav was super helpful and always available for us. The place is very clean and in a really good neighborhood.

Yoav is a friendly host and responds quickly to questions. He made early check-in and transport to the airport on early Saturday morning possible, for which we were very thankful. The apartment is very clean and well equipped. The location at Rothschild Boulevard near Habima Square is just great. Highly recommended!

We spent 3 nights at Yoavs place in rothschild boulevard. The Check in and check out was very well organised. The appartment clean and well furnished for a short trip. The area nearby has a lot of bars and cafes (and scooters). We had no problems at all during the stay concerning the appartment.
Great apartment. Perfect localization

Great apartment with a super location. Highly recommended !. Yoav was super helpful and communicating with him was super easy and efficient. The apartment is well equipped and super comfy would definitely return.
Good host, well kept studio, and good service/check in, but ultimately very noisy next to Rothschild Boulevard.

Holiday apartment with a great location, in the heart of Tel Aviv.
During our stay, it was noisy at night (sound of cars on the road).
We really enjoyed the easy check in/out processes.

The location of the apartment is amazing. In the heart of a very cultural and established part of Tel Aviv. Apartment was super clean and nice. Loved the experience. Check in and check out very smooth. I would go back again. Host was very responsive and professional.  Thank you.

Perfect match of description and the real thing. So read the description and you know, what you'll get. Top location in Tel Aviv with the beach, best restaurants, nice cafes closeby. I received the check-in information some days before arrival and everything functioned smoothly.
Such a nice studio at the best location en TLV
I would definitely recommend this place, perfect place to stay if you want to see all areas of TLV. Very clean, air con was great and lovely shower/wet room :)
A nice (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was very professional. Unfortunately, there is no way of cooking and no washing machine, in that case it would have been almost perfect.
Perfect location in the cultural centre of TlV. Walking distance to all major sites.
Yoav's place was great. Clean and ideally located.
Great location, clean apartment, and a good bed to sleep on!
I had a very pleasant stay. The apartment is clean and modern. It is in a good location, which feels very safe and is close to many bars and restaurants.

Yoav's Place is very clean and stylish and most comfortable to stay at. It is very central but quiet although it is on Rothschild Boulevard. Yoav was most helpful and friendly and I would recommend it most highly. It's very close to excellent cafes, Lachmanina and the Tachtit to mention a couple. I will definitely be back!
The apartment is in an excellent location and clean with all the basic amenities. Communication was fast and checking-in was hassle free. Highly recommend.
Everything was perfect! Nice clean place. I love the big trees in front of the house and the good vibes in the neighbourhood.
We loved Yoav’s Place because of the location. The apartment and the area around it made us feel at home right away! Highly recommended!
Great location and value for money if you are looking for a central but calm place from explore Tel Aviv. Yoav was super reactive in his communication.
Very central on the lively boulevard with lots of amenities close by. I would return for sure

The apartment had a great location close to almost everything you need. A lot of restaurants close by on the main road. The apartment was bigger than it looked at the pictures and was nice and clean. Towles was provided and you also could have drinking water from a water distiller. Yoav was very friendly and answered quickly on our messages. We were satying in the apartment for 5 nights.
Great studio, great location, great host. When back to Tel Aviv, I want to repeat everything for sure!

It is great apartment in wonderful location. We could walk by foot everywhere we wanted.
It is close to a wide range of restaurants, cafes and bars, bur is situated in quite area.
The room was exactly like in photos, great for a couple or two friends.
Thank you very much.
Great location and superb communication, thanks a lot Yoav!

Amazing location! Right by Habima Square and lots of things within walking distance - the beach was only 20 minutes walk away.
Yoav was quick to respond with any requests or queries which was great. We had a late flight and Yoav helped with a place to leave our bags that day which was greatly appreciated.
The studio was big enough for the two of us, with a fridge, microwave and water machine. We needed the iron and hairdryer a few times so they were really useful to have.
There was only one night when we heard any noise from outside, but there was something happening on the street and Habima Square so it was to be expected - but we still managed to sleep!

Thank you so much Yoav for creating such a lovely place to share, and for keeping in touch to make sure everything was ok. The location was absolutely superb. What a bonus. I will definitely be back with my husband Raphael. Janette

This accommodation was perfect for us. Clean, tidy, spacious and the location was great.  The self check in was very easy. The flat itself was very quiet, even though it was located in one of the busiest avenues for nightlife. Most bars and restaurants were 5-20 mins away (depending on what you are looking for) and the famous Carmel market was less than 25mins walk.  Yoav was a great host, he gave us some great recommendations and even allowed us check out later during the day as our flight was very late in the evening.   Thank you for a very pleasant stay!

Yoav is a super friendly and professional host, everything with check in and airport pick up worked out perfectly as he told us! The apartment is as beautiful as it appears in the pics, very clean and cozy and perfectly equipped with hairdryer, iron and everything you could ask for. The location is more than amazing, walking distance to all the cool spots in TLV. Thank you, we will be back for sure!!

Yoav's studio is located in the city center, at walking distance from all the nice cafés, restaurants, shops and the beach. The studio is very clean and contains everything you need for a comfortable stay, the airconditioning is a must and works perfectly. The communication between Yoav and I went very smoothly and his responses were always quick, friendly and helpful. The airport pick-up service they offer with friendly driver Ami was also great. Nothing bad to say about this AirBnB!

The apartment is perfect : amazing location in one of the best area of Tel Aviv : central, a lot of good restaurants, coffee shops and bars. The apartment is quite, beautiful and very clean. The communication with Yoav was very easy, and he accepts to adapt the check-in and check-out times which was very helpful for us. One of the best apartment i had the chance to visit in Tel aviv for that price. Perfect for one le two people.
Great location! Close to everything, fun area. Yoav was super helpful and communicative. The studio is clean and well maintained. We had a great time!

First of all, the location is 10/10 - literally everything worth seeing in Tel Aviv is right outside the door (or within a 3min walk) - cannot get any better than this!

Second, the flat was spotless, beautifully designed, equipped with everything you might possibly need. The bed is comfortable, the bathroom works well, the kitchen has all the necessary utensils and more, an iron, towels, bedding etc. Air conditioning works well (much needed in July!).

We stayed for a week, eating breakfast in and the rest of the meals out, I genuinely cannot find one thing wrong and the price/location/quality ratio was unparalleled! Strongly recommend.

This apartment is just great. It's a well-designed studio with everything you need for a comfortable stay. Yoav, the host is super accomdating. The location is amazing. This is the center of the center - walking distance from everything and of course literally on the gorgeous Rothschild boulevard surrounded by the famous Bauhaus buildings.

It's the second time we use Yoav's apartment and we're very  satisfied. Yoav helped us and was available to any question we had. Great singulare apartment which we used for a business guest but would also recommend it for vacations as it's located in one of the best areas in Tel-Aviv.

this is a great place if you're after basic and clean. The only negatives were that there was no shower curtain which problem as the shower is beside the toilet which is very inconvenient. You need to wipe down the floor and the toilet after showering. The wifi had issues and also i found the bed to be extremely uncomfortable. But overall the place is great for everything you need, location/convenience/cleaniliness.

It was my first visit to Tel Aviv and I wanna say, that appartment really nice and have perfect location. U can walk everywhere by walk and it takes your time. A lot of restaurants around, gardens and it only 20 min to the sea. What about Yoav, he is very nice guy who can help you at any time.

The place is great! In a nice and quiet neighbourhood,  The flat is equipped with everything you need. Yoav is fast in answering questions and gives all information you might need. I really enjoyed staying there!
This place is awesome for businesses trip. Enjoy every minute out of the street location with the lovely neighbors and amazing night places. People are very kind, helpful and very friendly. Regards
Cute little apartment in an ideal location. Perfect for two!
Excellent location, warm welcome and great hospitality. Very responsive and friendly host. Thanks Yoav!
Yoav was a great host. Very nice and helpful. The studio is well designed and maintained and the location is superb! Over all a great and recomended experience. Thanks Yoav and see you next time!

We stayed for at the apartment on Rothschild: it exceeded all our expectations. The position, the apartment and the service were some of the best we have encountered in several years of travelling and staying in serviced apartments. High recommended!
reviews.response: Thank you for your kind review, much appreciated! Yoav

reviews.comments:
חווית אירוח נעימה
דירת סטודיו די מרווחת ויפה במיקום מצויין
Self check in מאוד נח
ממליץ
המיקום של הדירה מעולה וקרוב להכל. קטנה אבל מספיקה לאדם/זוג

המארח מדהים, דירה נקיה וקרובה להכל
מומלץ מאוד
תודה על אירוח נפלא
Нет кухонной плиты, очень неудобно если оставаться на несколько дней.

Pas de possibilité de cuisiner,sinon top
Bien placé sur Rothschild à côté de habima

Wir waren zu 2. für 7 Nächte in Yoavs Apartment. Leider wurden uns die Schlüssel in der ersten Nacht nicht, wie versprochen, bei Ankuft überreicht und Yoav war auch nicht zu erreichen. Wir mussten Nachts mit schweren Koffern durch Tel Aviv und noch ins Hotel einchecken. Am nächsten Morgen hatte Yoav zum Glück sein Handy eingeschaltet und wir konnten endlich in die Unterkunft. Uns wurden die Kosten für die erste Nacht zurückerstattet (wir haben ca. 30€ durch die Hotelübernachtung verloren).
Das Apartment war sehr sauber, zentral und befindet sich am ruhigen Ende des Rothschild Blvds. Für 1-2 Personen perfekt. Trotz der ersten anstrengenden Nacht, hatten wir einen tollen Urlaub in Tel Aviv und haben uns in Yoavs Apartment super wohl gefühlt!
Appartement agréable et très bien situé.
Perfetto, appartamento pulito e centralissimo, ottimo rapporto prezzo/qualità, ospite impeccabile, consigliato!

Hi,
We zijn bij Yoav geweest om in Israel een familiebezoek af te leggen en om een indruk te krijgen van Tel Aviv en van het land. Tel Aviv is daarbij een goede uitvalsbasis en het appartement van Yoav is zeer de moeite waard.
Het is schoon en heeft goede, en werkende voorzieningen. In werkelijkheid is er wat meer ruimte dan de foto's doen vermoeden. Rustig gelegen. Leuke horeca voorzieningen heel dichtbij.
Kortom: wil je naar Israel dan is deze betaalbare voorziening een echte aanrader.

Perfecte studio op een perfecte locatie in Tel Aviv. Verblijf is prima voor 1 of 2 personen. Studio was schoon en had alle basisbenodigdheden. Goede prijs/kwaliteit verhouding.
De locatie is zeer centraal, op Rothschild blvd zelf kan je op verschillende plekken heerlijk op bankjes of ligstoelen een boek lezen of wandelen.
Kortom een aanrader om naar toe te gaan!
Las recomendaciones locales las mejores

Студия не большая, но комфортная для непродолжительного пребывания. Находится в конце (начале) Ротшильд и если свернуть на Бограшов, то окажешься у моря. Студия оборудована всем необходимым,: посуда, столовые приборы, холодильник, микроволновка, двуспальная кровать, ТВ с русскоязычными каналами. Отдельное спасибо хозяину апартаментов за гостеприимство и помощь в решении мелких проблем.

Квартира чистая,достаточно уютная. Мы снимали квартиру в феврале и было прохладно вечерами, но был кондиционер,который включали на тепло и было достаточно комфортно. Все для проживания в квартире есть, хозяина даже не видели ни разу, общались только через сайт,что нас вполне устраивало.Мнение о хозяине сложилось очень положительное, он отвечал на все вопросы, организовал нам трансфер из аэропорта, вышло дешевле,чем в официально такси. Квартира находится в самом центре города до моря минут 15 ходьбы, но так как мы отдыхали в прохладное время оно нас мало интересовало. Все понравилось, если кто-то из друзей поедет в Израиль будем рекомендовать эту квартиру.

Le quartier est super, et l'emplacement idéal. Lev Ha Ir, vraiment le coeur de la ville que l'on sent battre. Et quelle ville ! Accueil discret et sympa. Efficace. Logement agréable, propre et confortable. Bel immeuble. Relativement calme. Prévoir une solution parking si vous avez une voiture. Le mieux, c'est de ne pas avoir de voiture à TLV, inutile en pratique.

name: 🏝Peaceful 1BD Apartment at Gordon street🏝
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper

Supérettes et divers commerces en nombre au pied de l’appartement idéal pour les courses (dont un ouvert 24/24h) à trois min de la plage. Magnifique!
L’appartement est spacieux, la chambre est équipée d’un énorme dressing idéal pour les séjours longs! On y est comme à la maison! Le balcon est grand, avec une table et des chaises pour les petits déjeuners au soleil (le matin plein soleil sur le balcon c’est génial) ou pour un petit apéro ! Vraiment top.
La climatisation est fonctionnelle et efficace (pas de clim dans la chambre mais un fan au plafond très silencieux idéal pour la nuit).
Le wifi est rapide idéal pour bosser si besoin!
Les équipements : Machine à laver et étendoir à disposition pour les séjours longs c’est impeccable! Lave vaisselle micro ondes grand frigo ! Table à manger pour dîner à plusieurs , canapé lit dans le séjour et une vraie chambre avec un lit double. La salle de bain est fonctionnelle et propre, douche et toilettes propres également, (+ sèche cheveux de pro! J’adore !)
Tout est fait pour séjourner sans aucun stress, aucun problème d’intendance tout est pratique et idéal ! Je suis ravie de mon séjour chez David et reviendrais sans aucune hésitation! Merci pour tout !

Appartement idéalement placé ! À 150m de la mer. Énormément de restos et bars aux alentours. Dans l’appartement tout l’électroménager  disponible (micro-ondes, lave vaisselle, lave linge, four et grand frigo). Internet qui fonctionne super bien (fibre optique). Petit balcon avec table qui permet de dîner dehors. Grande réactivité de Yohan. Bon rapport qualité prix. Les choses qui pourraient être améliorées : un meilleur lit, des meilleurs coussins, un peu de décoration et l’ajout d’une télé ne serait pas de trop. Je recommande à 1000% !
