reviews.comments: This was a very nice apartment in an excellent location, 2 blocks from the beach and walking distance to cafes, shops, the life of Tel Aviv.  I highly recommend it - the apartment was a clean 2BR on the 5th floor, with washing machines; elevator in the building made it easy to get up there. Eli made check-in and check-out easy with his website, and he oversees a well-run operation (he seems to rent out a bunch of apartments). He allowed me to check in a couple of hours early and drop my luggage off when the cleaning staff was in the apartment, which I appreciated very much. A great value.  Thank you!
Great location. Eli was responsive.
Eli was very flexible and easy to get in touch with, the flat is perfectly situated and has all the amenities one could hope for!
very Pleasant stay
Nice spacious apartment on the fifth floor near the wonderful of Tel Aviv. We will be back!
Great spot. Perfectly located. Ideal for travelers who want a close-to-beach experience. Eli was a great and understanding host as well. Will aim to stay here again!!
The apartment was as advertised, clean and very well located.
Perfect

Eli's has a nice city apartment with a good view as it is on the 5th floor. The balcony is cool to hang with the sun in your face. We were two friends and the seperate bedrooms were a perfect fit. the apartment is well equipped with all the stuff you need for cooking.

The area around is lively and has all the shops and supermarkets around in walking distance. Gordon Beach is five minutes walk. There are several bus lines and taxis are passing all the time, so you have no poblems getting to wherever you need to.

Eli replied real quickly and the self check-in was totally uncomplicated.

I can recommend Eli's apartment and would consider coming again if I revisit Tel Aviv.

Thx
Great Flat !
Best location! Everything worked out good. Great apartment.  highly recommend it

We booked this very last minute and Eli got back to us right away with all questions we had.  The place was great and had everything we needed inside as well as being close to the beach (6-7 min walk) in a wonderful neighbourhood.  I have been to Tel Aviv many times before so I knew where to stay and what budget we had.  The only issue was on our arrival - the elevator was shut down and the apt is on the 5th floor.  I spoke with Eli right away, he was apologetic (he had not known there was a problem) and offered us another space, however due to coming in late we decided to rest and figure out to stay or move the next day.  Unfortunately the elevator was not going to be fixed during our time but we liked the place and location so we choose not to move and thought of the exercise we were going to get for the week.  Eli did arrange to meet us the last day and brought our bags down.  He also arranged a very good price on a taxi to the airport.  He is very professional and we would definitely stay here or any of his places again.

Great apartment in a great location! Everything in the apartment was in perfect conditions and clean.
Eli is a great host

Staying at Eli's place was far better than any hotel or anything we could have imagined. He made it extremely easy to get into the apartment, made us feel welcomed was attentive to our needs. He responded to emails quickly and ensured that everything was right. A host among hosts!
The place was exactly as advertised if not better as the kitchen was stocked with items you need but don't want to buy for a short stay.
The location was insanely perfect!!! 2 blocks for the beach, 2 blocks from all the action on Dizengoff, grocery, restaurants, shops, ATM all within a 3 minute walk. The balcony offered a beautiful view with serenity! Quiet at night and bustling during the day.
I have already recommended this place to many people and we can't wait to come back.

Eli was very accommodating and the apartment very comfortable, located in one of the mains streets of Tel Aviv very close to the beach and city center with many bar and restaurant nearby.
Clean and also the price ok, the other apartments I checked in this area for the same period seemed actually more expensive.
I recommend Eli and his apartment.

The apartment was like expected. Very good located. Central for nightlife and close to the beach. Everything for our stay was provided. Eli is a quick responder. I didn't meet him personally, but he provided all needed information for a smooth stay. Toda.
Our stay was wonderful, the location is great. The flat is comfortable, we've enjoyed and would like to come again.

Great apartment , host was easy to contact

Would recommend
Great flat and great location. Eli was very accommodating with times etc

Amazing apartment. Clean, good location and fantastic hosts!
Thank you so much for an awesome week in Tel Aviv.

We had the apartment with 4 persons for 12 days and it is exactly as shown in the pictures, very bright, friendly and clean. It's very well-equipped with everything you may need (even a scale is available - to check the luggage for potential overweight ;). The apartment is perfectly located on central and lively Ben Yehuda (for those who are light sleepers - one of the bedrooms is facing the street so maybe bring some earplugs). We got used to it after the second night and loved the location, it is very close to the beach (Gordon beach), restaurants, bars, (24/7) supermarkets and shopping areas.

Everything worked fine during our stay; we didn't met Eli but communication was easy and check-in/-out absolutely uncomplicated.

Thank you very much, we'd book it again!!!

PS: Restaurant recommendations just around the corner: Wineberg (Ben Yehuda 106) and Goocha (Dizengoff 171 - just around the corner)!!!
Bardzo dobra lokalizacja i fajna okolica.
Professionnel du début à la fin! Rien à dire!

IL a été très facilitant pour le Check in/out.

L'apt possède un emplacement de rêve à Tel Aviv!!! Commerces, restos, bar sympas ( ne cherchez pas loin! Celui d'en face est super!!)

description: ✌ Prime location! ✌ Well decorated & private small & cozy studio ✌ Small outdoor witting area✌ A perfect short term rental✌ Located in one of the most authentic places in Tel Aviv ("Kerem Ha-Teimanim")✌ Right next to the "Carmel Market", a ton of bars, cafes and great restaurants✌ The beach is 5 mins awayThe spaceA sunny & well decorated PRIVATE small studio with a small balcony, located on a quite street, just behind the "Carmel Market". Exactly 5 minutes away from THE BEACH and 10 minutes from City Center.Includes: ✌>> High-speed WiFi >> TV with Streamer box including NETFLIX, YouTube and many more.. >> Queen size bed >> Private bathroom >> Equipped kitchen (Fridge, Electric hot plate, Toaster-oven) >>AC >> Heating >> Fresh bed linen >> Towels (1 per guest) >> Shampoo >> Coffee & Tea.Guest accessYour own air-conditioned studio apartment + cute sitting area outdoors (ideal for smokers!)Other things to note••• The final price refers to guests visiting Israel on a tourist visa (B2/B3/B4). Other guests, or guests who don't present a copy of their border control and government-issued ID, will be charged an additional 17% VAT.•••בכפוף לחוקי המס המקומיים, אזרחי ישראל חייבים בתשלום מע"מ. מס זה אינו מחושב באופן אוטומטי בעלות הכוללת של ההזמנה ויש להוסיף את הסכום הדרוש. •••המחיר המוצג לא כולל מע"מ•••DO NOTE: Apartment is available for up to 2 guests, only one bed. The apartment is located in an old authentic Tel-Avivian building, right above a warehouse of one of the closest (and best) restaurants of the market.*Due to municipality laws, the streets that surround the Carmel Market must be clean and washed every evening by the workers. Be careful, the roads might be a little wet. No worries, it dries fast
additional_house_rules:
HOUSE RULES:

••• The final price refers to guests visiting Israel on a tourist visa (B2/B3/B4). Other guests, or guests who don't present a copy of their border control and government-issued ID, will be charged an additional 17% VAT.•••

בכפוף לחוקי המס המקומיים, אזרחי ישראל חייבים בתשלום מע"מ. מס זה אינו מחושב באופן אוטומטי בעלות הכוללת של ההזמנה ויש להוסיף את הסכום הדרוש לאחר ביצוע ההזמנה

•••המחיר המוצג לא כולל מע"מ•••

Just to make sure we're on the same page ;) 
• Yup. You can check-in/out independently 24/7 if you check in AFTER 3 pm and check out BEFORE 11 am.
• I'll send you full directions 1 day prior to your arrival. 
• I prepare the place by default according to the number of guests shown in the reservation (2 guests = 2 towels = 1 set of sheets = 1 double bed), and supply 1 towel per 1 guest (indoors use only) for the entire time of your stay. 
• Typical market noises - potential noise between 7am-7pm (not every day, not on the weekends).
• Typical old Tel-Aviv building. 
• Please respect our neighbors and don't be too loud (especially don't play loud music after 23:00). Obviously, lock the house when you're gone and shut down ALL electricity. 
• Please – no smoking / no late check-outs without approval - if one of these occurs during your stay, a 100$ fee will be billed to your account. 

• Also, this is not mandatory but greatly appreciated - You will get the place clean and tidy, please give it back in a good condition, and not a total mess :)
••• We wish you a great stay, thank you for choosing to stay at our place! •••
transit: >>> By car: its very comfortable to get around. There is a huge parking lot (called "HaKovshim Parking Lot") just a few minutes away.>>> By bus: The apartment is very close to the "Carmelit bus station"- a central bus hub from which it is possible to travel all around Israel and of course, Tel Aviv.>>> By foot: Almost everything Tel Aviv has to offer is within' a walking distance.>>> By bicycle: Bicycle rental shops close by called TelOfan. Cheap and super recommended.>>> By E-Scooters: There are 3 e-scooter companies that runs in the city,  Bird, Lime and Wind. Very easy to use to get almost anywhere in town. Just drive safley :)

additional_house_rules:
חוקי הבית:
רק מוודאים שאנחנו באותו ראש :)
• 24/7 כן. אתם יכולים לבצע צ'ק-אין/אאוט באופן עצמאי 
אם אתם עושים צ'ק-אין לאחר השעה 15:00 וצ'ק-אאוט לפני 10 בבוקר.
• הנחיות מלאות ישלחו יום אחד לפני הגעתכם.
• אנו מכינים את המקום כברירת מחדל בהתאם למספר האורחים המוצג בהזמנה (2 אורחים = 2 מגבות = סט סדינים = מיטה זוגית אחת), ומספקים מגבת אחת לאורח אחד (לשימוש בבית בלבד) לכל הזמן השהות שלכם.
• רעשי עיר אופייניים - רעש פוטנציאלי בין השעות 7-19 (לא כל יום, לא בסופי שבוע).
• זהו בניין תל אביבי ישן טיפוסי.
• אנא כבדו את השכנים ואל תרעישו יותר מידי (במיוחד בלי מוזיקה רועשת לאחר השעה 23:00). 
בבקשה תנעלו את הבית כשאתם יוצאים וכבו את האור והמזגן.
• אנא - ללא עישון/צ'ק -אאוט מאוחר - אם אחד מאלה מתרחש במהלך שהותכם, תחויבו בתשלום של 100$.
• המחיר הסופי מתייחס לאורחים המבקרים בישראל באשרת תייר (B2/B3/B4)
אורחים אחרים, או אורחים שאינם מציגים עותק של בקרת גבולות ותעודה מזהה המונפקת ע"י הממשלה, יחויבו במע"מ בשיעור של 17%.
• המחיר המוצג לא כולל מ"עמ.
• כמו כן, זה לא חובה אבל מוערך מאוד - אתם מקבלים את המקום נקי, אנא החזירו אותו במצב טוב, ולא בלגן מוחלט :)

קשה מאוד למצוא חניה באיזור (כמו בכל תל אביב).

ניקיון סביר
ריהוט לא מעולה,
המיטה היתה מאוד לא נוחה וקפיצים מורגשים ולא נעימים. חורים בספות.
היה מיזוג סבבה, ראש מקלחת שבור שמקשה להתקלח .

additional_house_rules:
Just to make sure we're on the same page ;)

• Yup. You can check-in/out independently 24/7 if you check in AFTER 3 pm and check out BEFORE 10 am.

• We will send you full directions 1 day prior to your arrival.

• We prepare the place by default according to the number of guests shown in the reservation (2 guests = 2 towels = 1 set of sheets = 1 double bed), and supply 1 towel per 1 guest (indoors use only) for the entire time of your stay.

• Please respect our neighbors and don't be too loud (especially don't play loud music after 23:00). Obviously, lock the house when you're gone and shut down ALL electricity.

• Please – No smoking (there is a fire detector at the apartment)  / No late check-outs without approval - if one of these occurs during your stay, a 100$ fee will be billed to your account.

• The final price refers to guests visiting Israel on a tourist visa (B2/B3/B4). Other guests, or guests who don't present a copy of their border control and government-issued ID, will be charged an additional 17% VAT.

•  המחיר המוצג לא כולל מע"מ עבור אזרחי ותושבי ישראל. לאחר ביצוע ההזמנה תשלח אליכם בקשה לתשלום 17% מע""מ.

• Also, this is not mandatory but greatly appreciated - You will get the place clean and tidy, please give it back in a good condition, and not a total mess :)

A stylish, clean studio apartment tucked into a nice neighborhood with some great restaurants in walking distance. My husband enjoyed having a relaxing evening and morning cup of coffee at the cafe right next door.  The bed was extremely comfortable with plenty of pillows and the walk-in shower was great! The night life around is lively, with people walking on the streets late at night, but we didn’t find the noise intrusive at all and enjoyed a good night’s sleep. Communication was great and they made sure to check in on us to see when we would arrive and how our stay was going. Unfortunately we damaged the legs of the coffee table by dumping my enormous suitcase on it, but they were very gracious when I alerted them. A very cozy overnight stay!

THIS PLACE IS NOT RECOMMENDED AT ALL ! ITS OVER PRICED AND LOW QUALITY.
We really feel we got scammed here. Sad experience.
Tel Aviv is awesome! However - we had a really bad time in this place.

1. It statred with the place being dirty.
2. continued with the wifi not working and it took them 2 days to come by and fix it.
3. The TV never worked for the entire 5 days - they never fixed it!
4, And for a grand finale - in the last day - 2 hours before check-out, someone opened the door and came in the unit! The cleaning person has his own keys and simply came in without even knocking!

We tried to communicate with the host - but they dont provide a direc path for coommunications - only a remote reception number with a person working for them having no clue and no means to help besides saying "im trying to contact the staff at the place and waiting for their response".

Before our arrival, we sent a messege sterring how important the cleanliness is to us since since the guest (my family) is a recovering cancer patient after bone-marrow transplant - and still, the bed was dirty! The walls had food-stains on them! The floor was messy with hair and dirt.
We specifically asked if the place is quite, but its located just above an espcially noisy place. When the cleaning person walked in, my guest got so scared she packed everything up a once and called me frightent to come pick her up asap.

We really feel we got scammed here. Sad experience.

name: Prime Location Studio Apartment by Homy
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Beach access – Beachfront - Guests can enjoy a nearby beach
Private entrance - Separate street or building entrance
Single level home - No stairs in home
Pets allowed - Assistance animals are always allowed
Luggage dropoff allowed - For guests' convenience when they have early arrival or late departure
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
Building staff - Someone is available 24 hours a day to let guests in
description: A lovely renovated  studio apartment. Very pleasant and tastefully decorated.Enjoy the wonderful location of the apartment - only 150 meters from the beach on one of the city's main streets.Stay close to everything within a short walk, with maximum access to public transport along with the possibility to have a small and pleasant corner due ti the fact the apartment is not facing the main street.This is the most perfect accommodation place in town. Suitable for a couple or an individualThe spaceA studio apartment in prime location - heart of Tel-Aviv by the beach and the main tourist attractions. The apartment has been recently renovated - everything is new, clean and super comfortable. The apartment is cozy, it has ultra fast Wifi, super comfortable bed, new AC, the kitchen has everything you need to cook and there is a great natural light coming from the windows.Guest accessThis is an entire apartment and therefore you would have private access to everything the apartment has to offer.On your arrive day You can enter the apartment at 2:00pm.On your last day we will start the cleaning from 11am ,at the morning.If you need any help with your suitcase, that will not be a problem.Other things to notePlease note that 17% VAT is applicable for any guest not entering the country on a Tourist (B2/B3) VISAParking is available in an additional NIS 50 and must be ordered in advance.Breakfast is served in a Cafe near the apartment and vouchers can be purchased at an additional charge.The apartment is on the ground floor and during the hot summer days there is a slight chance of insects.It is important to note - the apartment is completely sealed and sprayed frequently so the chance is very low.Animals are allowed.
interaction: I will do my best to make sure everything is perfect for your stay,  I am available 24/7 on what'sApp.I would be very happy to assist with any question, consultation or request for help
transit: The easiest way to get around in Tel Aviv is by bicycle. you can easily rent one on an hourly basis (tel-ofan), There's a station right in front of the building and I'll be happy to show you how to use it.The city is a walking city, very easy to get around.All public transportation is near, dozens of buses and shared taxis (Shi-rut). And you will easily observe the high beat of movement and how to get yourself from one place to another

reviews.comments: Amazing spot in the perfect location! Great people and very helpful. Would definitely stay here again next time I’m in the city :)
Not bad. You get what you pay for. It was smaller than expected and the bathroom wasn’t so nice. The shower water took a long time to get hot. Overall it was okay
Great!
Thanks a lot, super effective communication and option for late check-out was clutch.

Great place. Very close to the beach. Right next to a 24/hr "grocery store".

Clean. Fresh towels.

10/10 would rent again

This is a great place for 1-2 people looking for somewhere that is only a couple of minutes away from the beach. The apartment was as described. It is a bit of a long walk if you want to go to Jaffa, but the tayelet/promenade is gorgeous and makes the walk worthwhile. I would definitely stay here again.

Prime location, easy to get in, very save
I would stay again.

Ori’s place is very close to the beach. There’s a convenient store that’s open 24 hours right next to the building, as well as a laundry area across the street. And a lot of good restaurants are also around the neighborhood. I love the place for its convenient location. Also, it’s in a safe neighborhood. The apartment offers everything that I needed to have a comfortable stay in Tel Aviv.
What a great little spot for a short stay! Super central location (and so close to the beach) plus super quick communication by the host makes it a perfect place as you explore Tel Aviv.
Everything was amazing. Perfect, simple, amazing location. The host was very helpful and attentive to whatever I needed.

A simple comfortable place. Great location with shops and restaurants  of any kind, and minutes to the best beaches. While in center of activities, the studio is amazingly quiet (Website hidden by Airbnb) Great value.
Great location fully equipped ! Very pretty and convient!
A perfect place for 1-2 people. Everything is within walking distance from the apartment and it’s right next door to a 24 hr market. Will be staying here again in the future :) !
Great location, very close to the beach.  Apartment appears as advertised in the photos.  Host was responsive and helpful.
thanks!

I thoroughly enjoyed staying in Ori’s studio apartment. Recently renovated, the air conditioning was cold, the property was clean, and bathroom modern.

The location can’t be beat! Walk to the end of the block, turn the corner, and there’s Frishman Beach. It seems to be within walking distance or a short taxi ride to most attractions in the beach areas of Tel Aviv and Jaffa.

Ori is a gracious host, responsive and willing to recommend a good restaurant or help with suggestions for tours!

I utilized the studio as a base from where I toured the country and made my way to Petra and Wadi Rum in Jordan. Always a plus packing for the day and not having to haul around bigger suitcases.

On my next visit to Tel Aviv I’ll definitely stay there again!
reviews.response: Thank you very much Blaine, I was very happy to have you! I wish you all the best and have fun later on your trip :)

reviews.comments: Great apartment in a great location, so many places around which are walking-distance. The apartment was very clean and accurate to the photos. The kitchen was pretty well-equipped. The TV is large and has Netflix, YouTube, Spotify, etc. which was really nice. We had a great time staying here.
Great location, a little small but if you’re just looking for a place to crash it’s good. Clean room and communicative host.
A perfect place to stay. Host was really great. Location doesn't get better than this place - beach, restaurants, bars, etc.
Beautiful place to stay...

Ori's place was great, exactly as pictured and described in the listing. Communication was easy and the self-check in was smooth. The studio room is located in the heart of Tel Aviv, small but comfortable and above all VERY affordable! The room was clean and the bed was very comfy. Great option when staying in Tel Aviv!
Great location and super clean! A lovely stay!
Great place, looks like the pictures and great location
Ground floor, easy check in
The place is Great! Very clean, nice decor touches, comfortable bed, everything you need is there :)) The location is amazing, highly recommended Thank you Ori :)

Perfect place with a perfect host.
Thanks
Very well organised place close to the beach! :)
Great location, everything within walking distance.  Great hospitality.

Great location but very basic equipment. Easy to access and close to the beach. Ground floor very convenient. No windows with outside view.
The host is not visible but super reactive
It’s ok for a few days in this nice city and enjoying the beach. Not for a romantic stay with your partner !

I spent 5 nights at Ori's place at the beginning of November 2019. The place is ideally located and well equipped (TV, AC, ventilator, fridge, microwave, ...) . Communication with Ori was excellent. There might be some marginal room for improvement on light and noise isolation, as well as on the general maintenance of the bathroom's equipments. With this in mind, I would recommend this place to other guests.
reviews.response:
Thank you Pierre for all your feedback!
Happy to hear you had a good experience overall!
we are currently working on improving the bathroom facilities like you mentioned, we are waiting to host you again!

reviews.comments: Quite an okay apartment that was very cheap and next to the beach
Centrally located, compact lock up and go apartment walking distance from the beach. Perfect for one or 2 people who are out and about during their stay. Free WiFi and Netflix is great!

Thank you for hosting me at your studio flat. The flat was great and what I really loved was its location. Central, 2 minutes walk to the beach, bus stop in front of the flat with direct bus (445) to and from Ben Gurion airport, very clean and modern, 24 hour super market right next to the flat, sheer number number of bars, cafes, restaurants and bakeries within very close proximity. What else to ask for! It has everything you need to enjoy the great city of Tel Aviv!

This studio apartment is in a fantastic location. Just a few minutes from the beach.  It was easy to get in, and was just as pictured on air bnb.  Ori was easy to communicate with, and answered calls and emails right away.  Had a great overnight experience.  Thank you.

The cutest place for a couple!!!
Location is so amazing.
Cannot get a better prize quality.

Oh and Ori, is a awesome host!
Nice comfortable apartment right next to the beach, but also close to shops, restaurants etc. Ori is a great host, he’s very responsive and helpful.

Studio apartment in an amazing location - 3 minute walk to the beach. Great air-conditioning and a perfect place to stay if doing a long weekend in Tel Aviv and you need a base to sleep. Would highly recommend, great communication throughout stay.
Nice place!
Great location, clean and well-appointed. Communication was excellent, recommended.
Very nice and homely small space in close proximity to the beach and many shops and restaurants in the area

The studio is pèrfectly located in a trendy part of Tel Aviv close to beach and restos.
However there are 2 factors that might or might not be important for some;
The bed is really uncomfortable and the mattress is super soft!
There is no window at eye level or that can be open so it’s a bit claustrophobic.

But I had a nice stay and was ok for a quick visit.
reviews.response:
Dear Madhu,
I'm very happy to hear that you enjoyed in our apartment :)
As we discussed in our telephone conversation, due to what you said to me, the mattress and the bed were replaced by a new one!
As for the window, it is important to note that the curtain and the window can be opened over the bed with the special hook attached to it.
However, I was happy to host you and I'll be more than happy to host you again in the future !!

Shalom,
Ori

reviews.comments: Would recommend
Ori's place is very well located, close to the beach and restaurants.

Great host, very welcoming, allowed early check in and late check out at last minute. Studio was very clean and just as advertised. Great location, short walk to beach and cafes and bars close by. Great value for money
Quiet cosy studio apartment in perfect location.

We had an absolutely great stay! Omer and Ori are amazing hosts and so switched on! The flat is perfect, clean compact and in an amazing location ... so close to the beach, to busses, to shops, the market or the sights or the night life! Plus it’s quite and such a great value for money too!

I would highly recommend it to anyone visiting Tel Aviv/Israel!

Omer & Ori thanks for making our stay in Tel Aviv amazing!

If you are looking for a clean, safe, great value space in Tel Aviv, then this is a perfect choice. So close to everything. I needed a base from which to make my way around Israel. Buses and taxis were literally minutes away, as was the beach. This apartment has everything a single traveller or a couple would need to enjoy their time. I loved the location, though what was also very important for me was that Ori and Omer were not only responsive, but super helpful and answered questions I had. They certainly did everything they could to provide tips when I asked, to help me make the most of my time. A couple of beers left in the apartment to welcome me on arrival were also appreciated and added a nice touch. Thank you, I will be back.

Ori was a great host, his communication was excellent and he was very responsive. The apartment was exactly as described, in a great location near the beach and situated on a main street of Tel Aviv. Despite this, the apartment was actually very quiet. I had everything I needed including air conditioner / fan, TV with cable, fridge and kitchen amenities. It’s a small place but very comfortable. I stayed in Israel for 3 weeks and given all of the reasons above, I considered the accommodation to be really good value for money. I would definitely recommend this place for all of the reasons above and overall, I am very happy I chose to stay there. Thanks Ori!

This apartment is beautiful for couples. The location is perfect for any interests! Beach is close by, Dizengoff is right around the corner, Serona, the shuk and the namal are all a bus ride away. Plus there are loads of 24/7 supermarkets very close by. The apartment itself is cosy and stylish. The aircon is super effective (so good). The hosts are very quick to respond and are quite friendly. The place was cleaned before we arrived and they left us a few presents as well :) The only thing that was slightly off was the lack of cooking utensils and shampoo that would probably be expected. I would highly recommend this place and can't wait to go back there when I travel to Tel Aviv again!

I had an amazing time staying here. You can't beat the location - you can walk to almost anything in Tel Aviv and you are right next to the beach! The inside is exactly as advertised. There is great AC (for when it gets really hot in TA), a full kitchen, large fridge and nice bathroom.

The hosts were also great. They were always available to message and even welcomed me with beers and chocolate. Would definitely recommend staying here!

Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Private entrance - Separate street or building entrance
Elevator - The home or building has an elevator that’s at least 52 inches deep and a doorway at least 32 inches wide.
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: My place is located on the corner of Dizzengof and Ben Gurion Boulevard, one of the city´s best location. A beautiful Bauhaus building close to public transport, nightlife, beaches and shops.The flat is great for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and perfectly equipped for families with kids; there is a crib upon demand as well as a baby chair and a sofa-bed (1.60*2.00)Business traveler (among others) can ask for a small printer/scanner as well as for iron and a board.The spaceThe apartment is situated at the second floor of a beautiful and fully renovated Bauhaus building in one of the best central Tel Aviv locations. You´ll love the beautiful decor, the comfy bed, the light and the amount of amenities.
interaction: I´ll be happy to give you any recommendations or suggestions about things to do in my city and the rest of the country and to help you with anything you may need.
transit: The apartment is located in the city center, close to supermarkets, cafes, restaurants and bars.Only 10-15 minutes by bus or taxi from the train and bus stations coming from Ben Gurion Airport and walking distance to the main Tel Aviv attractions (less than 10 minutes from the beach, 15 minutes from Hayarkon Park or 20 minutes form the Carmel Market, Tel Aviv Museum or Habima Theater)

reviews.comments:
Great location !
Super clean!
Professional host, will defiantly stay here again

If you’re looking for a beautiful apartment in Tel Aviv, stop looking and book this one. The place is outstanding, clean, on one of the most sought after corners in Tel Aviv and Ariel is incredibly hospitable and accommodating.

For anyone working while they’re here, the WiFi was fast and reliable at all times.

11/10 would rent again
Great house, clean and roomy. I did not hear any noise from the street despite the fact it’s a prime location.

Terrific stay!
Ariel was informative and accommodating with check in and check out place. Since we were traveling with a baby, he provided a crib, little tub for the shower, a high chair and even a few toys!
We stayed at the location for 10 days and Ariel made sure to send us a cleaning person to tidy the place and provide fresh towels and sheets.

The location itself is very central, with an abundance of places to shop, eat and drink and just a 10 minutes walk from the beach.
We’ll be very happy to stay at this location during our next stay in Tel Aviv.
Great host in a great location.
Hot Spot in TLV. Cool for kids, cooking is nice, close to beach. Enjoy!
Ariel has a great place. Exactly as advertised. She is a very responsive host. I'd stay here again!
We will come back to the same place for sure!
Excellent stay.  The apartment is gorgeous. Ariel was very helpful.
Great place, super central and near the beach, and Ariel was a great, responsive host to work with.

Perfect location, close to the beach area, restaurants, cafes and grocery stores.
The apartment is clean and quiet.
Ariel answered quickly to all our messages and was very kind.
We had a great stay. We loved the location and the apartment was cosy but had everything we needed. Don’t expect it very quiet in this area. Ariel was there when we needed it. Thanks!
Great location, specious and clean.
Excellent location in the heart of Tel Aviv. Responsive host. Ideal for 2-3 people.

Ariel apartment is in good taste and just perfect location!!! We had the best time in TLV being close to all the colours , tastes and sounds this city has to offer, and at the same time the cool and quiet apartment gave us the haven we needed from time to time , we enjoyed it very much!
Great location & apartment. Easy check-in and out. 2nd bedroom perfect for crib. Ariel was kind and made sure also a high chair and kids utensils/plates/cups were provided! Highly recommend!
Thank you , I really enjoy you smart apartment. Will recommendation for friends

the location of this apartment is the best location of Tel Aviv!
the apartment is really big, full of light, very clean and you can find everything you need and even more. I recommend this place and i am sure i will be back next time i will come to Tel Aviv. the Host is really nice and gave all the necessary information as i checked in to my own apartment.

We had a good time staying at Ariels apartment. The apartment is very suitable for visiting Tel Aviv, going to the beach etc. It had all the equipment for kids that we needed, including toys!
The apartment is accessible with a digital key, which is super comfortable. It is close to many restaurants and bars. Ariel was extremely helpful when I reached out to ask a question about the TV.
I definitely recommend this place and this host.
Very nice place in an excellent location. Highly recommend!

Great place we sure will visit again
Thank you
We had an amazing stay. Everything went smoothly from check in to receiving all the baby accessories that we needed. Thanks Ariel!

Excellent apartment right in the middle of Dizengoff Street. The apartment was very clean and overall great value for money. Right next to the apartment, there are restaurants, shops, supermarkets, and bus stops. highly recommended
Ariel is a very generous host. The apartment is exactly as described, very clean, great location, spacious. Will definitely recommend to anyone visiting Tel Aviv

Amazing location, in my opinion the best in Tel Aviv
Just 5 minutes walk to everywhere beach malls and whatever your might needdThe apartment is very clean and comfort
Great location , responded quickly to all issues , good value for the money
Great location, super host.
Great place!

Very comfortable and amazing appartment, just near the smart center of Tel-Aviv, very close to the sea and with many restaurants and shops around. Ariel is very very helpful. The only bad point is that the flat is a bit noisy. If you don't mind for this , it's a perfect flat.
Everything was great!
Great location!
I always stay in one of Ariel’s apartments when I’m in TLV. Love the building, the modern decor and the comfortable medium soft beds. Best area of TLV to stay too. Loads of bars and restaurants.
We had a very pleasant stay, location is amazing, super central and everything went very smooth. We completely recommend!
Perfect stay! We had all we needed. Very good communication with Ariel, great automatic check-in, independency and cleanless. Also perfect location. We will definitely be back.

The apartment is very close to Gordon Beach and right in the middle of restaurants and bars, yet almost sound proof - hence a quality sleep. Place is exactly what it seems in the photos. Very nice place for families with child. Maybe big for loners and couples. We had some problems of course. Ariel is a very solution oriented man. He is helpful and kind. You just need to tell what your problem is.
Super clean, stylish and comfy apartment. Ariel is a very flexible, helpful and nice host. Thanks a lot!
reviews.response: Of cause. I would be delighted to host you again :)

reviews.comments: As described! Ariel was very nice!

Really amazing apartment! We loved our stay! Very clean and super nicely furnished!
The location could have not been better for us (although one should keep in mind that it could get noisy, as it is located on a highly frequented street crossing).
Ariel was a really good communicator and always available when needed!
We will for sure be back next time we're in Tel Aviv - thank you Ariel!

this place is great, modern clean and nice.
location is awesome and surprisingly not noisy.
communication and check-in were very easy with the check in system installed.

thanks
Great Apartment in a great location with a very helpful host.

We visited Tel Aviv and loved the location and the apartment itself.
Ariel was very helpful and clear with easy and convenient automatic check-in.
The apartment is a bit noisy, but you have to pay that price if you want to "feel" Tel Aviv for real :)
Wonderful
Ariel’s place is a MUST in Tel Aviv, I don’t believe there is a better location in the city. We had an amazing time and would definitely come back next time!

Comfortable , well laid out apartment. Have your coffee on the sunny balcony in the morning and watch the world go by :) looks just as in the pictures. The mechanical lock with codes on the door makes it all so easy - you don’t have to worry about losing the key at the beach! Ariel was prompt to respond. The apartment was serviced once a week. Definitely the most comfortable bed EVER! The location is perfect, super close to the beach and also short walking distance to practically everywhere :) I do agree with what some previous guests have said - it’s really noisy - but that should be expected of a frontal apartment on one of Tel Aviv’s liveliest streets ;) the doors and windows block out quite a bit but you might need earplugs to sleep. (I did). That said, not once did I wake up from the noise and the bed really is amazingly comfortable. All in all a great choice!

We live in this apartment for the second time! This is a great apartment !!! all that we need for a comfortable stay! The beach in 10 minutes of walking! Ariel is a very good host! Service is excellent! We are very satisfied! We will return again and again! Thanks Ariel!!!!!
Мы второй раз проживаем в этой квартире ! Это отличная квартира !!! Все что необходимо для комфортного проживания ! Пляж в 10 минутах ходбы! Ариель очень гостеприимен ! Сервис отличный ! Мы очень довольны! обязательно вернемся еще и еще !!!
Very nice appartement in a nice area! Ariel was a good Host! Thanks!

Ariel's apartment is really nice, clean and comfortable. The position is perfect, in the center of Tel Aviv, 5 minutes from the beach.
We stay there 5 days with our children and they enjoy a lot the bed in the second room.
Ariel is a super nice host. He give us all the necessary to make our journey comfortable and he provide us a chair, a bed and a bath for our baby
We will of course contact him again!

Had a lovely time. Stayed there during our family vacation with two young kids and a baby. Ariel was a great host, and provided us with all the necessary baby stuff and city info. Apartment is very centric! Just a quick walk to the beach. All of us, adults and kids, enjoyed the stay very much!

This place is awesome! The location is fantastic - right next to awesome restaurants and 10 minute walk to the beach. You can also find small grocery stores nearby so if you want to get food for breakfasts and lunches and eat at home, that's very manageable. The space is very nice -- it was like a little oasis away from the hustle and bustle of downtown Tel Aviv. I would 100 per cent stay with Ariel again if I come back to Tel Aviv.

Ariel's apartment is a perfect apartment, very nicely furnished and decorated in a renovated Bauhaus building. It's location is just perfect as bars and restaurants are just there and the walk to the beach only takes 10min. We enjoyed our stay there completly independent and will come back definitely. Staying at Ariel's place is highly recommended!

A newly (another cheaply - IKEA) renovated apartment at a fabulous location in the heart of hip TLV. That's the end of the good part.
Cracks and humidity over the ceiling in the main bedroom (wish I had the option to upload a picture). Rust at the glass screens enclosure in the tiny shower/toilet room. No Bathroom amenities, and just one pair of body and hand towel for each guest for 3 days! On top, a non-existent unprofessional owner (or manger of similar units in TLV) with an attitude and all communication being exchanged via text messaging... After we commented the lack of shower gel and shampoo, and requested for an extra pair of body bathroom towels the answer was "...2 towels (hands and body) for each person is more than reasonable for 3 days". I guess that's the Israeli standard of cleanliness. We replied that elsewhere in Europe service standards are higher for the price we had to pay and we got another answer "I have no problem for you going to those flats that offer MORE even for a cheaper price for a brand new 2 bedroom flat in this amazing location. And I'll return you ALL YOUR MONEY. Please confirm if you'd like that". Obviously next time we should feel obligated just because we were paying for the location of the apartment and not the actual service and amenities standards?! Eventually, as we did not have a better too-good-to-refuse offer to abandon the apartment and get our money back on the 2nd day of our holidays... the "owner" provided for some beach (!) and bathroom towels and a hair conditioner (!) and a shower gel.

The next day and on departure the toning of the communication changed to "accommodating" and "polite" as he was keen to protect his, as he had mentioned, awarded "Super Host" status and great reviews. Offered us and arranged for a cheap taxi transfer to the airport.

Exploiting tourists (and locals) and paying only for the location of the accommodation, unfortunately has become a standard in TLV.
reviews.response:
After 1000 guests I've hosted I guess I had to run into someone like you.
You were so impolite from the first sentence,not even good morning Ariel - directly demanding and complaining; you have zero environmental awareness
If you need more than one big body towel and a hand towel for 3 days.
These are my flats , I am not a manager and as I saw from the beginning that there will be no way of satisfying your demands I suggested a full refund if you were so unhappy. You forget to mentioned that nevertheless I've supplied all that you asked for and that I gave you a very late check out the last day with no charge.
I offer to all my guests the cheap taxi to the airport, you would of known that
if you would have read some of the reviews, guests are thanking me for that.
it seems the words thank you are not familiar to you.
For last I will ask you - if TLV is so bad for you why do you keep coming?

I wish you more happiness and less bitterness
All the best
Ariel

reviews.comments:
So great flat ! Maybe one of the best of Tel Aviv :-)
Thanks Ariel !
Second time already with Ariel. And here again he did a wonderful job as a host Apartment in super condition. Next time Ariel again!

Amazing stay in a beautiful apartment. Clean, comfi beds with a lovely sunny terrace !!! Close to all amenities! Ariel was a fantastic host from a distance helping us finding good placed to eat, a ride to the airport etc. Can't recommend this place enough. Good value for money as well !!

This is a really nice and clean place in a great location. The decor is well-chosen and Ariel is very helpful and responsive to any additional requests. The location couldn't be better with many restaurants and bars around and a very quick walk to the beach. The downside of the hip location is the loud street noise coming from the cars and the bar opposite to the bedroom window. I had to get earplugs to get sleep there. But generally I enjoyed my stay here very much.

We had the best apartment we could ever imagine ! and we had the best best best host ever ! Ariel was so caring and organized all - it was perfect !
The apartment is very clean , beds are comfortable , kitchen and living room perfect size for 3 and bathroom seems brand new ! The view over our neighborhood was incredible - 2nd floor / from balcony ! And the street were we live for the 4 days is the best area you can stay in Tel Aviv! We had a super nice stay and trip ! Definitely recommending this appartment , we will come back soon ! Thanks to Ariel, and thank you organizing a cap for us the last day !!!!!

Location is perfect! Very nice street cafe in front of the apartment. Everything in the apartment is brand new, clean. There is no microwave and the hot water needs to be switched on in advance( 20 min) in order to be warmed up. 1 bedroom bed set was not changed.

הדירה מהממת, המיקום הכי שווה בת"א.
התמורה על המחיר היא מעל לכל ביקורת!
אריאל היה אדיב, זמין וגמיש בשבילנו בכל שלב!
ממליץ בחום על הדירה!!

הדירה נעימה ומאוד פרקטית.
התארחנו משפחה של 5 נפשות.
יש לה מיקום נהדר, והכניסה פשוטה ונוחה.
למרות הקרבה לרחוב הראשי, כמעט ולא שומעים אותו.
ממליצים בחום.
דירה מקסימה, מיקום מושלם! אריאל היה זמין ואדיב!

מיקום מצוין, נוח וזמין, דירה מתוקה ופרקטית. היינו זוג וחמישה ילדים והיה מאוד נוח.
על אף המיקום המרכזי מאוד שקט באופן מפתיע.

הדירה של אריאל נמצאת במיקום מושלם, נעימה, נקייה למופת, מאובזרת ונוחה לזוג עם ילדים. אריאל השאיר לנו כסאות אוכל לילדים, כלי אוכל לילדים ואפילו כמה בובות . הילדים נהנו ואנחנו איתם! לא פחות חשוב הצ'ק אין, הכניסה לדירה והתקשורת עם אריאל היו נוחים ויעילים. תודה אריאל!

דירה נוחה, נקייה ונעימה באחלה מיקום!
התארחנו עם תינוקת והיה מאוד נוח (כל האבזור קיים), ממש ממליצים!
אריאל היה מאוד זמין ונכון לסייע בכל בקשה.

Very comfortable, clean and warm apartment in a great location!
We stayed there with our 1 year old, the place was well equipped for her :) we highly recommend!
Ariel was available for any request or questions.

הדירה מקסימה , נראית בדיוק כמו בתמונות .
מיקום מעולה , דירה נקייה ומעוצבת .
הצ'יק אין היה קל ומהיר .
למרות המיקום הסואן בדיזינגוף הדירה שקטה ונעימה.
החסרונות היחידים כמו לרוב הדירות בתל אביב הם חוסר בחנייה קרובה וזולה ולחץ המים הנמוך ועם שניהם הסתדרנו בלי בעיה. בשורה תחתונה נהננו מאוד , תודה !

קודם כל, דירה מהממת, מרכזית ונוחה. אריאל מארח מעולה, זמין לכל שאלה. אפילו דאג להמליץ לנו על מקומות באיזור ונתן טיפים לתפעול של הדירה שיתאים ל5 בנות. כבר מתכננות לחזור. תודה על הכל!
first of all, the place is gorgeous, central and comfortable. Ariel is a fantastic host that is available for any query you might have. he even made sure to recommend some places to go to during our stay, and tips to make sure the apartment was suitable for all five of us. cant wait to come and stay here again.

Ariel ist ein toller Gastgeber, der jederzeit erreichbar ist und sich extrem bemüht - auch bei Problemen, die nichts mit der Unterkunft zu tun haben.
Während des einwöchigen Aufenthalts wurde die Wohnung sogar geputzt und alle Handtücher gewechselt.

Die Wohnung selbst entspricht exakt den Fotos und ist sehr sauber.
Es stimmt, dass es recht laut ist, das ergibt sich aber aus der tollen Lage Dizengoff/Ben Gurion. Die Lage war für uns traumhaft.
Wir und unser Baby haben super geschlafen, das Bett ist sehr bequem.
Erwähnenswert ist vielleicht noch, dass es fünf Stufen bis zum Lift sind.

Wir waren sehr zufrieden und würden jederzeit wieder die selbe Wohnung wählen!
Ariel  这房子是典型的包豪斯建筑。屋内的设施一应俱全，入住全自助非常的方便。离海边很近，交通便捷。楼下各种餐饮店，超市，便利店，生活很方便。特别推荐。
Super appartement , je le recommande vivement !

Alles war super. Das beginnt schon bei der ausführlichen Beschreibung aller Dinge, die man für die Wohnung (check-in etc) benötigt und endet beim Check out. Ariel hat uns sogar angeboten ein Taxi zum Flughafen zu bestellen, da am Samstag keine Busse fahren. Perfekte Gastfreundschaft.
Die Wohnung selbst ist wirklich hübsch und sauber.
Klimaanlage funktioniert sehr gut und schnell. Das war bei der der Hitze sehr erfrischend.
Die Umgebung bietet alles was man braucht: kurzer Weg zum Strand, Bars, Restaurants, und Supermarkt direkt nebenan.

Absolute Weiterempfehlung

Appartement très bien situé.
Propre, bien équipé.
L’hote est très réactif.
Je recommande.
Saubere Wohnung. Lage sehr gut. Ariel ist immer hilfsbereit. Nachts bis 1-2 Uhr kann schon wegen des Verkehrs laut sein.

We enjoy our stay!!!

Logement très bien situé, très propre et bien équipé (avec un petit balcon très appréciable) dans un immeuble rénové récemment.
Ariel a répondu à nos demandes avec réactivité et efficacité.

reviews.comments: Wonderful location. Eli was a great host- always available and quick to respond. The apartment was nicely decorated.
Eli was fast to respond to any questions that we had. The apartment is located in such a vibrant part of town with so much to do immediately around it! We loved our stay and would recommend!
This is a very good apartment in a very desirable area. Minutes walk to Gordon beach and Dizingov. Great bars and restaurants all around. We will stay here again.
A very centrally located apartment with a very responsive and helpful host!

The apartment is in great location, on a main street and close to the beach and cafes, markets and restaurants.  Super easy self check in and check out and Eli very accommodating and quick in his responses.
Eli is a great host and very reponsive. Apartment is nice and in a great location.

The flat is in prime location. Size is great . Eli was very responsive and helpful . But the flat is very dated . Need fresh bed sheets. It's also on the main road of Ben Yehuda so it can be noisy sometimes . The shower has great pressure but if you are taller than 1.60 m you will need to bend to wash your hair .
it's west facing and on the 5th floor so its nice to sit in the small balcony all hours of the day .
My daughter and her friend had a great time. The apartment was clean and basic in a fantastic location. Eli was quick at responding  and was very helpful when we had queries.
Stayed with Eli for over three weeks. Great location.

For anyone wanting a central location, and clean apartment which is well equipped Eli’s apartment is the perfect place.  But more than anything Eli was so very helpful for our family when we needed to stay in Tel Aviv, and his gratitude went above and beyond . We will highly recommend his apartment for family and friends in the future.
Perfect spot, central, clean and has everything. Eli is a great help and communicator.
Great location, good value for money, quick communication.
This is an airy apartment on the fifth floor in a very central location. The host, Eli, is an excellent communicator who responded to all our queries within minutes. Definitely recommended.
Very nice location,  recommend!

Appartement bien placé dans un immeuble agréable.
Balcon très agréable.
Points faibles, la literie de mauvaise qualité et une mauvaise odeur persistente

Отличная квартира, где есть все необходимое для комфортной жизни. Прекрасное расположение - на центральной улице, но при этом не шумно.
Мы очень довольны!
Спасибо за гостеприимство!

Pros: Departamento amplio con una ubicación excelente. Muy luminoso y silencioso. Comunicación con Eli excelente.
Algunas contras: agua caliente en ducha irregular y un poco deficiente. Algunos detalles de limpieza a mejorar: habría que cambiar la cortina de baño, algunas muebles estaban viejos o poco ventilados (camas y sofá de living) y algunas toallas manchadas.
Die Lage ist sehr gut, nah dem Strand, tollen Restaurants, Busstationen und Läden. Die Wohnung ist Grosszügig und toll. Kann auf jeden Fall weiterempfohlen werden.
Hôte joignable facilement.

Een fijn, ruim, schoon en prettig ingericht appartement op de vijfde etage, met een balkon waar je in de middag tot laat zon hebt. Fijn in voor- en najaar. Bushaltes en supermarkt vlakbij, evenals leuke horeca. En op 5 minuten lopen van Gordon beach.
De gastheer Eli is er eentje om in te lijsten. We hebben hem niet gezien, sleutel in een locker, maar stel een vraag via e-mail of app en hij reageert per omgaande.
Aanrader!
